original_reviews: stayed at the hotel just before fleet week so it was very busy we were upgraded which was nice and the room was very comfortable with a street view we had asked for a quiet room but there was a constant fan noise in the room all night after we turned the air con off which we complained about we were told that it was the same in most of the other rooms nearby and after looking at moving to a smaller room we decided to put up with it however what surprised me is that the receptionist never asked if we managed to sleep etc not great customer service if you are staying there avoid room 306 or take ear plugs on a positive the hotel was well maintained and the staff were pleasant especially chloe who despite loosing her voice was very helpful
reviews: this looks like an organized fraud and you have to look at your credit card bill after checking out the employee at front desk suggested that we empty the mini bar everything was there in plain sight right next to the tvso that we can use the fridge before checking out we putted everything back in plus 2 extras beers that i did not drink check out went fine well guess what my crdit card was then charged for the entire mini bar 82us they finally reimbursed me other than thatit is clean but very very small rooms public parking 200 meters away for 40 day

original_reviews: the argonaut hotel is at fishermans wharf next door to the cable car terminus the restaurants and shops are right outside the door our room overlooked the golden gate bridge and the cable car turnaround our room was very comfortable and large we enjoyed the wine bar downstairs and the blue mermaid bar the staff at reception are helpful and welcoming a great memorable stay
reviews: fabulous hotel and set the bar very high for the rest of our usa trip loved the nautical theme and rooms were fabulous the outside and of the building is very impressive too great location and staff were helpful and friendly
cleaned_advanced: fabulous set bar high rest usa trip loved nautical theme fabulous outside building impressive great location staff helpful friendly

original_reviews: stayed here for four nights in early july 24 to celebrate my sons birthday and 4th july fishermans wharf is a great place to explore lots of shops ranging from touristy to decent goods there are also some excellent restaurants such as fog harbor the hotel was in a great central location and you could walk to many places from here we walked to the golden gate bridge a little over 35 miles which was tough going as it was a hot day but a lovely walk nonetheless the rooms are comfy and spacious facilities like the bar and fitness room are pretty good too food and drink prices are a bit on the high side but its decent quality all in all a very good stay
reviews: i attended an international conference in san francisco in december and booked my accommodation very late i would usually have stayed much closer to the central business district or the convention centre eg intercontinental but all of these hotels were already full i was very impressed by the service at the argonaut from the time i arrived until i checked out five nights later the room had quite a quirky nautical theme and was decorated and furnished to a high quality with a really comfortable bed the exposed brickwork at one end of the room was an unusual feature and really suited the dcor the breakfast in the blue mermaid restaurant was average i only ate there on one morning the location is great if you want to be in the centre of the action at fishermans wharf in close proximity to the golden gate bridge alcatraz etc for business it is not quite so convenient i had a number of early morning meetings in other more central hotels eg le meridien and had to get a taxi there and back a small fare 10 usd which seemed to irritate the drivers i would consider staying at the argonaut again if i was travelling for leisure with my family but probably not when i return to san francisco on business due to it being a bit further out than i would like

original_reviews: we stay here every anniversary and have a great tome love the location i would say you should stay here they do make you feel special and that you do matter the only thing is they should smile when they answer the phone but in person they are terrific they always do a special touch for us when we go every time so i so appreciate it
reviews: we stayed for 6 nights and it was wonderful it is an old factory turned into a hotel so it has that charm very clean room beds were very comfortable bathroom had a tubshower combo shower good water pressure one sink vanity but the top is very large so everyone has room for their toiletries towels were above average in plushness closet had lots of hangers and a safe night table had two drawers and dresser had two large drawers other area of dresser taken up by a dry and refrigerated mini bar in room coffee maker large tv on swivel with more channel offerings than most hotels ac worked really well housekeeping was very good doormen always good natured and eager to assist concierge arranged one day car rental for us for only 40 for the day nice lobby with board games to entertain the kids and some adults fantastic location right on the wharf with so many restaurants bars and shops just a short walk away buses and trolley right at the end of the block hotel has a bar and restaurant but we never drank or dined there for us it was a perfect place to stay

original_reviews: the room was huge clean and comfortable the bathrobes provided were fabulous i ordered one as a gift after i got home the location is perfect steps away from many attractions on fishermans wharf across the street from the cable cars close to lots of things the staff is very helpful and friendly
reviews: really liked this hotel room was well done clean and had great touches and decor it was not cookie cutter and didnt feel like every other note staff is great overall location is good but does get busy on weekends with tourists out along jeffereson st and the end of the cable car line it was a bright spot in our trip to sf

original_reviews: what a gem located in the fishermans warf area of san francisco it is close enough to be close to the touristy ward but far enough to be peaceful and relaxing we stayed here during the fleet week which we had never heard about when we were making reservations in early october the front desk staff concierge are awesome so helpful and really went the extra mile to make sure we had a great trip all of the employees seemed to really like their coworkers and enjoy their jobs and it really shows and made a difference we stayed in a deluxe king room i was disappointed because the bayview rooms were sold out but was pleasantly surprised to find that after checking if any bayview rooms had come available during checkin my deluxe nonbay view room had a small view of the bay it was obstructed but i still got that view i was looking for the room was an average size and very clean bathrooms were very well equipped love the bigelow toiletries beds were comfy and came with a variety of pillows which i really appreciated lots of cool extras like yoga mats in the room and animalprint robes i wont lie the reason why i chose this hotel over a couple of others in the warf was it offered complimentary wine beer every night in the lobby judge me i dont care this is san francisco and everything is expensive the lobby was slightly cramped it was packed but everyone seemed to really be enjoying themselves and letting loose a little bit what a great way to meet other travelers i also thought it was pretty neat that no one was on their phones during the wine tastings for a society that is so plugged in it was nice seeing everyone interacting with people right in front of them not a screen we met some really interesting people this way and appreciated the lady serving the wine and her knowledge of the area this hotel loves pets it was cool seeing so many dogs in the hotel i didnt travel with my animals but from my understanding this is free the restaurant the blue mermaid has awesome clam chowder also get the mrs doubtfire recommended by my server its a delightful cocktail last but not least be sure to join the kimpton karma rewards program before you book your room this allows you to get free wifi for your entire stay as well as a free 10 bar credit or 10 minibar credit at all of their hotels for every stay although the hotel isnt centrally located in san fran i love the location it is very close to the powellhyde cable car and is in the quieter section of the fishermans warf also very close to ghiradelli square
reviews: location cleanliness staff all great for being on the wharf i had some doubt on safety at night both nights we were out late tons of people and families still out homeless are there but they were more entertaining than anything singing dancing playing instruments if you have a pet the location was nice as its directly next door to the maritime park beach is right there along with ghiridelli square and the buena vista for some irish coffees lobby was comfortable to hang out in in the evening nice fireplace we brought our fur baby she was welcomed by all
cleaned_advanced: location cleanliness staff great wharf doubt safety night night late ton people family still homeless entertaining anything singing dancing playing instrument pet location nice directly next door maritime park beach right along ghiridelli square buena vista irish coffee lobby comfortable hang evening nice fireplace brought fur baby welcomed

original_reviews: i stayed for 3 nights and the property met all expectations it is a high quality property with clean rooms and great service i would stay here again but be mindful that if you are going for business you will have to budget at least 15mins to get to the financial district or union square
reviews: the staff are awesome at this hotel we stayed for a quick two night vacation for my husbands birthday staff were very polite and attentive they even left a package for my husband in the room we loved being able walk to fishermans wharf and were right next to ghirardelli square room was clean and the mini bar is stocked with awesome goodies just in case definitely will stay again
cleaned_advanced: staff awesome stayed quick two night vacation husband birthday staff polite attentive even left package husband loved able walk fisherman wharf right next ghirardelli square clean mini bar stocked awesome goody case definitely

original_reviews: great room really nice hotel botique type great location facing the ocean next door to cable car roundtable well located for sightseeing view of the golden gate shopping great restaurants in walking distance close to giardelli chocolate store
reviews: we really liked the ambience of this hotel its location is perfect the room was clean and tidy this is a premium style hotel in a a good location so everything costs a bit more and the resort fee is a bone of contention the 10 a day voucher in the bar was the only bit used but we knew this prior to arrival and accepted it would of been nice to have a fridge in the room for personal use charging an extra 15 for an extra fridge is a cheek as the one supplied was for the mini bar the staff were always attentive friendly and very helpful just a note for other travellers when booking the hop on hop off bus take the two day option one day isnt enough
cleaned_advanced: really liked ambience location perfect clean tidy premium style good location everything cost bit resort fee bone contention day voucher bar bit used knew prior arrival accepted would nice fridge personal use charging extra extra fridge cheek one supplied mini bar staff always attentive friendly helpful note traveller booking hop hop bus take two day option one day isnt enough

original_reviews: i have stayed here a total of 4 times and loved each and every stay the rooms are clean fresh sheets close to everything lovely and helpful staff the building itself is full of history and the museum near the front loby is amazing if your into maritime history i loved it worth the price
reviews: we have been to san francisco several times but this was out first stay at the argonaut but it will definitely not be our last it is a lovely hotel in the ideal spot if you want to be in the fishermans wharf area the staff were tremendous we had asked for a room that overlooked the park and we were not disappointed the concierge service is brilliant and a little tip for you if you intend hiring bikes from blazing saddles a few doors down which we would also recommend the argonaut has 8 complimentary bike vouchers each day with them it is a first come first served basis in the morning but we got them both times we asked it isnt the cheapest hotel in the area but you get what you pay for we paid 400 a night for a room that gave us a view of where the cable cars turn round in the park which is what we wanted there can be a bit of noise early in the morning outside so if you like to sleep with your window open just be prepared to be woken up every now and again but it didnt stop us getting a good nights sleep
cleaned_advanced: san francisco several time first argonaut definitely last lovely ideal spot want fisherman wharf area staff tremendous asked overlooked park disappointed concierge service brilliant little tip intend hiring bike blazing saddle door would also recommend argonaut complimentary bike voucher day first come first served basis morning got time asked isnt cheapest area get pay paid night gave u view cable car turn round park wanted bit noise early morning outside like sleep window open prepared woken every didnt stop u getting good night sleep

original_reviews: i do not know why you charge an extra after i paid you all through expedia people at the front desk told me that with the extra payment they make me i can use bicecles but i do not like that also a motor bike but they anly had four and they were busy
reviews: good bits the location the view from our room of the bay and alcatraz the complimentary bottled water at reception bad bits not good value for money our suite was very expensive and the rest of the hotel did not live up to expectations service was non existent we took our own bags to our room no assistance was offered every time we tried to call guest services we got an ai bot that was utterly useless and infuriating the restaurant was average with surly service and very expensive our one and only experience with the concierge on our first morning was so poor we relied on google from there on in she ignored the questions we asked and tried to upsell us on things we werent interested in the one piece of info we did get out of her turned out to be incorrect the hotel is in a beautiful old building but alas feels soulless in the communal areas and there is no sense of a hub staff werent rude but neither were they friendly there was little proactivity there was a lot of chatting amongst themselves while guests stood around waiting for attention overall our stay was not terrible but neither was it great and for the money we spent it wasnt good value so we could not recommend it we were not asked about our stay at checkout i was send a satisfaction questionnaire after leaving which i filled out honestly but the hotel has not followed up about any of our feedback it just felt like they didnt care very much a real shame

original_reviews: from the moment we walked through the doors we felt welcome the staff was professional and the property was top notch in quality and value you truly cant beat the location just steps from ghirardelli square and fishermans wharf its a great option if you dont want to have to rent a car highly recommend
reviews: close to everything loved the location and surroundings great service by the valet and hotel staff wonderful food at the attached restaurant would have liked a bigger view of the marina window was small
cleaned_advanced: close everything loved location surroundings great service valet staff wonderful food attached restaurant would liked bigger view marina window small

original_reviews: best location in sf in my opinion room was spacious with everything you need right on fishermans wharf a five minute walk to the end of the cable car line and within walking distance to pier 39 and pier 33 alcatraz the only reason this review is not getting five stars is the lack of a bar if you want a drink in the hotel you sit at the bar of the adjoining restaurant other than that a big thumbs up
reviews: my husband and i arrived monday afternoon john and andreas were simply fantastic always willing to take the time to see how we were and helping with suggestions to any questions we had our room had a fantastic view and the champagne and happy honeymoon was such a grand touch loved this stay and will be really sad to say goodbye saturday morning and the rooms are cleanvery very important
cleaned_advanced: husband arrived monday afternoon john andreas simply fantastic always willing take time see helping suggestion question fantastic view champagne happy honeymoon grand touch loved really sad say goodbye saturday morning cleanvery important

original_reviews: we stayed here for our last night in the city the room is spacious and very comfortable the staff is exceptional and always willing to please it was pouring down with rain and they gave us an umbrella to use while walking around they have a nice little happy hour each evening and at christmastime it was beautifully decorated the front desk and valet staff went out of their way to address all our needs its always a treat to stay here and they have the coolest robes to wear
reviews: very comfortable rooms friendly staff great location in the heart of fishermans wharf there is a ben and jerrys two doors down which you get discount in staying in the argonaut hotel meaning it smells lovely as you walk back and you get to have lovely icecream every day the attached restaurant is expensive id recommend boudins for breakfast instead
cleaned_advanced: comfortable friendly staff great location heart fisherman wharf ben jerry two door get discount staying argonaut meaning smell lovely walk back get lovely icecream every day attached restaurant expensive id recommend boudins breakfast instead

original_reviews: i spent 2 nights at the argonaut hotel at fishermans wharf in san francisco its an excellent hotel with en excellent very nice staff at a location which is hard to beat it has an excellent restaurant the mermaid the rooms are clean and the whole atmosphere is very nice i will come again
reviews: spent three nights here and it was a convenient spot for the family easy access to nice restaurants fast food and tourist attractions including a cable car stop next door staff were friendly and free happy hour was a nice treat
cleaned_advanced: spent three night convenient spot family easy access nice restaurant fast food tourist attraction including cable car stop next door staff friendly free happy hour nice treat

original_reviews: this hotel is amazing and in a wonderful location on fishermans wharf from the moment you are greeted at the front door to the time you check out all the staff are so friendly helpful and eager to ensure your stay is enjoyable the rooms are well appointed and furnished with all the amenities needed they also have a wine happy hour for guests where you can enjoy a complimentary glass of wine and mingle with other guests it is also a pet friendly hotel which i loved having left my pets in australia i was able to pat the occasional well behaved pooch
reviews: overall a great experience with this hotel it is at the west end of jefferson street which is the hotspot at fishermans wharf you will be in walking distance of the piers bus tours and the cable cars many restaurants and other activities front desk was very helpful in arranging a car for our transport back to sfo bellmen housekeeping and all other staff were very pleasant and professional this was an excellent experience in san francisco
cleaned_advanced: overall great experience west end jefferson street hotspot fisherman wharf walking distance pier bus tour cable car many restaurant activity front desk helpful arranging car transport back sfo bellman housekeeping staff pleasant professional excellent experience san francisco

original_reviews: we just returned from a week long trip to san francisco we were fortunate to stay at two excellent hotels one of which was the argonaut there is much to like about this hotel its grand appearance the top flight staff the spacious rooms the fantastic lively lobby and helpful concierge and desk staff really great location if you want to take explore the golden gate bridge via bicycle its a short ride they also have urbe scooters for guests to use my kids loved tooling around the neighborhood on them the desk staff was also nice enough to hang onto our bags for an entire day after we checked out plus they let us hang around the lobby until our uber arrived both gestures were above what many hotels can muster rooms are a bit pricey but they are very wellappointed and super clean the only thing we didnt like has nothing to do with the hotel specifically but we stayed in the union square neighborhood for three days prior to our move down to the argonaut and found that neighborhood much more to our liking than fishermans wharf which is very kitschytacky beautiful harbor views from the argonaut alleviate the kitsch somewhat but venturing out can be a challenge despite that we would stay here again in a heartbeat well done to all at the argonaut
reviews: arriving after a long flight from the uk we found the hotel easily and were welcomed into this lovely and friendly hotel we were originally given a room on the 4th floor 408 but there was a loud noise from some air conditioning units and immediately on requesting a different room was given one no questions no quibbles and very friendly explaining the noise issue these 4th floor rooms with noise are referenced in other reviews too hotel is a great location right next to the cable car terminus on the edge of fishermans wharf and also next to a park and beach so you arent in the middle of and taking ages to escape some of the worst excesses of the fishermans wharf tourist trap its also nice to see fishermans wharf early in the day when there are few tourists about our room 267 was large clean and beds very comfortable happy hour between 56 every night served complimentary wine and beer a great idea after our long days out in sf as a family of 4 we originally booked a double queen room with view for 3 days but then found that it was 200 cheaper for the same type room without a view the windows are quite small this was a good decisionand since we were out most of the day loads of other restuarants and breakfast places nearby so would recommend eating outside the hotel and you can ride the cable cars either earlier or later when its quieter valet parking whilst expensive was a breeze and be assured that is a godsend in sf all in all a great hotel great service great location would we stay there again definitely
cleaned_advanced: arriving long flight uk found easily welcomed lovely friendly originally given th floor loud noise air conditioning unit immediately requesting different given one question quibble friendly explaining noise issue th floor noise referenced review great location right next cable car terminus edge fisherman wharf also next park beach arent middle taking age escape worst excess fisherman wharf tourist trap also nice see fisherman wharf early day tourist large clean bed comfortable happy hour every night served complimentary wine beer great idea long day sf family originally booked double queen view day found cheaper type without view window quite small good decisionand since day load restuarants breakfast place nearby would recommend eating outside ride cable car either earlier later quieter valet parking whilst expensive breeze assured godsend sf great great service great location would definitely

original_reviews: hotel is great for the location and being able to walk to the areas surrounding the hotel fishermans wharf pier 39 etc stay is comfortable and rooms are immaculate staff is friendly and willing to help with anything you need in my opinion valet and parking were a little expensive but i understand parking is at a minimum in san fran so it is what it is try the in house restaurant amazing food and chowder
reviews: once youre inside it gets less frenetic than on the street but the decor is cheesy blue nautical on the whole a pretty good hotel nice wooden beams the little museum next door is delightful breakfast was ordinary and very expensive stay here if you want to be right in the thick of it
cleaned_advanced: youre inside get less frenetic street decor cheesy blue nautical whole pretty good nice wooden beam little museum next door delightful breakfast ordinary expensive want right thick

original_reviews: slt21 thank you so much for taking time out of your day to give us a review the team is excited to had made your stay truly memorable the argonaut is in the middle of all local attractions on the waterfront ghirardelli square is a block away from the hotel the cable car turn is next to us both the aquatic park and hyde street pier is across the street when you are done site seeing stop by the blue mermaid for a cup of our award winning chowder or enjoy a glass of wine in front of a fire pit on our patio we hope to see you visit us again in the near future
reviews: ive stayed in many sf hotels and picked this one for the location for this trip although the rooms with supposed views had a glimpse of the bay at an angle in the distance front of house staff were friendly and concierge helpful no information on hotel or the city to be found in the rooms room itself was nice furnishings a bit shabby though bathroom very dated and small for the room size adjoining restaurant is ok but limited and not great choice overall the hotel was fine for what i had wanted but not sure id return
cleaned_advanced: ive stayed many sf hotel picked one location trip although supposed view glimpse bay angle distance front house staff friendly concierge helpful information city found nice furnishing bit shabby though bathroom dated small size adjoining restaurant ok limited great choice overall fine wanted sure id return

original_reviews: i loved the nautical theme hotel is in a great location near the peirs the chocolate company is right next to the hotel great resturant blue mermaid in hotel near public transit easily accessible by car
reviews: we went here last minute due to a failed airbnb experience it was the last night of our honeymoon and so the woman checking us in very kindly upgraded us to a huge suite we were so pleased the suite was gorgeous with lots of nice touches like animal print robes and a big jacuzzi bath we didnt have much of a view but we werent too bothered about that seeing as we got the free upgrade the location is brilliant as you can just wander out the front door and within minutes you are at fishermans wharf and pier 39 with views to alcatraz and the golden gate bridge the hotel itself is actually quite funky and there are complimentary guest drinks beer and wine in the lobby each day at 530 we didnt eat in the restaurant so i cant comment on that however we did get breakfast room service which was quite pricey but nice for a treat the staff are what really make this hotel a great experience from the reception desk to the bell hop they all went out of their way to be super friendly and helpful
cleaned_advanced: went last minute due failed airbnb experience last night honeymoon woman checking u kindly upgraded u huge suite pleased suite gorgeous lot nice touch like animal print robe big jacuzzi bath didnt much view werent bothered seeing got free upgrade location brilliant wander front door within minute fisherman wharf pier view alcatraz golden gate bridge actually quite funky complimentary guest drink beer wine lobby day didnt eat restaurant cant comment however get breakfast service quite pricey nice treat staff really make great experience reception desk bell hop went way super friendly helpful

original_reviews: good location bright and clean a bit impersonal i guess there are always people staying here for just a brief time they were polite but not keen to think outside the box it would have been nice to have milk provided with the teacoffee in room so when i went to ask for some at 745 this morning i was told that i had to wait until the restaurant opened at 8 the restaurant and bar close at 10 too no flexibility with small requests a bit intransigent we were 8 hours ahead mentally and it would have been nice to know that facilities like milk etc were available int he night should we have wanted them even better put it in the room there is a fridge after all the concierge was lovely when it came to making phone calls regarding our trips but i got the feeling that for the behindthedesk staff engaging the guests is not a high priority there is no drive for excellence which is a shame would i stay again yes probably forewarned is forearmed and i would plan accordingly but i would probably look for a friendlier place out of choice it felt just like having a nice bedroom and i was looking for a bit more than this
reviews: we stayed here for a night between our international flights recently we arrived at 830 way before check in and the hotel were very accommodating in looking after our bags and going out of their way to get a room ready early for us gave us a free coffee voucher for the restaurant and arranged for a table for us to have some breakfast reception staff were very friendly giving great help on local transport and where to go they even called me when our room was ready later that morning room was very nice something different from the usual same old same old hotel rooms great to have an opening window for fresh air something that seems to be very unusual these days location is fantastic right next to the tram stop to get you into the city and union square right on fishermans wharf for all the attractions there completly different atmosphere to our earlier stay in sfo and much more enjoyable all round would recomend to anyone and will stay there again when we return

original_reviews: our favorite place in san francisco away from the really crowded downtown area but easy to get to just about anywhere in town it is like staying at a destination resort right on the waterfront and a nice walk all the way down to the embarcadero district while enjoying all of the sites along the way what a great place great and very friendly staff and nice accommodations with a free evening wine bar a great lobby to meet and visit other guests and it is pet friendly we have taken our 95lbs goldendoodle wilson there many times he is quite a hit with folks the staff makes every effort to make our stay special and always enjoyable
reviews: my wife and i flew from los angeles for a weekend the museum was closed which really was disappointing the weather and hotel were fabulous great trip and all employees were helpful most restaurants and places were open the trolley cars were shut down still the embarcadero was not busy
cleaned_advanced: wife flew los angeles weekend museum closed really disappointing weather fabulous great trip employee helpful restaurant place open trolley car shut still embarcadero busy

original_reviews: we had a comfortable and pretty bay view room looking out to alcatraz i wish we would have spent a little time in the lovely cozy lobby next time the location of the hotel is very convenient for a walk to the piers ghiradelli square and the turn about for the hyde powell trolley line every staff member that we encountered at the argonaut were pleasant helpful offering to answer questions and this really enhanced our stay highly recommend
reviews: hotel is located at the hyde and powell turn around close to everything but most importantly its across from the buena vista and their fantastic irish coffees and breakfast besides walking along the embarcadero we walked the opposite direction to the marina district palace of fine arts crissy field ant the golden gate ferry to sausalito just a couple blocks skip scomas and blue mermaid terrible tadich grill gary danko fog city diner yummy

original_reviews: my son and i were 1st time visitors to sf and found this hotel to be the perfect option for us because of its proximity to the ggb pier 39 a major tourist hub and pier 33 where the alcatraz cruise departs the argonaut is the best option for those who need to be close to the main tourist attractions we rented bikes from blazing saddles around the corner and biked over and back the ggb we did a vantigo tour of sf in a vw bus which departed 2 blocks down the street snd we did dylans tour to muir woods with lunch is sausalito which departed from marina park again across the street we loved the convenience but we also appreciated the friendly staff supercomfy beds and linens plenty of drawer and closet space easytouse safe and spacious accommodations
reviews: we stayed here in march for a day trip to san francisico and we loved it the nautical theme is charming with the location pros called for an early checkin hotel was accommodating umbrella in room helpful for the rain great mini bar selection fabulous location near pier 39 quick uber ride to other parts of the city like the golden gate super helpful concierges great view from our room we could see alcatraz cons none we loved it here definitely would stay again
cleaned_advanced: stayed march day trip san francisico loved nautical theme charming location pro called early checkin accommodating umbrella helpful rain great mini bar selection fabulous location near pier quick uber ride part city like golden gate super helpful concierge great view could see alcatraz con none loved definitely would

original_reviews: this looks like an organized fraud and you have to look at your credit card bill after checking out the employee at front desk suggested that we empty the mini bar everything was there in plain sight right next to the tvso that we can use the fridge before checking out we putted everything back in plus 2 extras beers that i did not drink check out went fine well guess what my crdit card was then charged for the entire mini bar 82us they finally reimbursed me other than thatit is clean but very very small rooms public parking 200 meters away for 40 day
reviews: excellent customer service staff are responsive and knowledgeable spouse is disabled and staff did everything extra to accommodate us the location of the hotel is exciting and scenic i was planning my next stay before even checking out
cleaned_advanced: excellent customer service staff responsive knowledgeable spouse disabled staff everything extra accommodate u location exciting scenic planning next even checking

original_reviews: fabulous hotel and set the bar very high for the rest of our usa trip loved the nautical theme and rooms were fabulous the outside and of the building is very impressive too great location and staff were helpful and friendly
reviews: 100 will return to the argonaut my family of four visited the property and everything from arrival to departure was wonderful the bell staff jeremiah and jose was efficient and made arrival on the busy street so easy check in was welcoming and informative tzentin sorry if misspelled was wonderful at the front desk while i didnt speak with him in person ky helped me via phone twice which i appreciated very much jenmy at the restaurant was an all star my family loved the chowders especially the crab our room was clean spacious and we loved all of the subtle hints that we were in a ship port mirror star fish pillow etc the gym had really great machines i should also mention that our two dogs who traveled with us enjoyed their pet bed bowls and treats the location of the hotel right next to aquatic park was perfect for walks and seeing the sunset behind the golden gate the service that the argonaut provides is on point personable memorable after a few disappointing stays at different hotels it was so refreshing to receive such great service and a comfortable safe and clean room to come back to at night

original_reviews: i attended an international conference in san francisco in december and booked my accommodation very late i would usually have stayed much closer to the central business district or the convention centre eg intercontinental but all of these hotels were already full i was very impressed by the service at the argonaut from the time i arrived until i checked out five nights later the room had quite a quirky nautical theme and was decorated and furnished to a high quality with a really comfortable bed the exposed brickwork at one end of the room was an unusual feature and really suited the dcor the breakfast in the blue mermaid restaurant was average i only ate there on one morning the location is great if you want to be in the centre of the action at fishermans wharf in close proximity to the golden gate bridge alcatraz etc for business it is not quite so convenient i had a number of early morning meetings in other more central hotels eg le meridien and had to get a taxi there and back a small fare 10 usd which seemed to irritate the drivers i would consider staying at the argonaut again if i was travelling for leisure with my family but probably not when i return to san francisco on business due to it being a bit further out than i would like
reviews: had a great time this hotel argonaut is excellent in a great place great room trendy bars and reception and very very friendly staff we really did enjoy the hotel and this lovely city 1010 for the hotel david
cleaned_advanced: great time argonaut excellent great place great trendy bar reception friendly staff really enjoy lovely city david

original_reviews: we stayed for 6 nights and it was wonderful it is an old factory turned into a hotel so it has that charm very clean room beds were very comfortable bathroom had a tubshower combo shower good water pressure one sink vanity but the top is very large so everyone has room for their toiletries towels were above average in plushness closet had lots of hangers and a safe night table had two drawers and dresser had two large drawers other area of dresser taken up by a dry and refrigerated mini bar in room coffee maker large tv on swivel with more channel offerings than most hotels ac worked really well housekeeping was very good doormen always good natured and eager to assist concierge arranged one day car rental for us for only 40 for the day nice lobby with board games to entertain the kids and some adults fantastic location right on the wharf with so many restaurants bars and shops just a short walk away buses and trolley right at the end of the block hotel has a bar and restaurant but we never drank or dined there for us it was a perfect place to stay
reviews: the room was huge and very clean i have never been is such a cool hotel the staff was always happy to help with anything we needed my wife needed a spoon and bowl for her ice cream and the guy with the cool hat brought it up to her the museum was very cool the lounge area was nice to sit and relax before or after a meal at the blue mermaid over all it was an awesome experience
cleaned_advanced: huge clean never cool staff always happy help anything needed wife needed spoon bowl ice cream guy cool hat brought museum cool lounge area nice sit relax meal blue mermaid awesome experience

original_reviews: really liked this hotel room was well done clean and had great touches and decor it was not cookie cutter and didnt feel like every other note staff is great overall location is good but does get busy on weekends with tourists out along jeffereson st and the end of the cable car line it was a bright spot in our trip to sf
reviews: recently stayed for 4 nights at this hotel with family and can honestly say great hotel and perfect location hotel service was good and standard and cleanliness of room perfect if staying in san fran and want to be on the wharf this is a perfect hotel
cleaned_advanced: recently stayed night family honestly say great perfect location service good standard cleanliness perfect staying san fran want wharf perfect

original_reviews: location cleanliness staff all great for being on the wharf i had some doubt on safety at night both nights we were out late tons of people and families still out homeless are there but they were more entertaining than anything singing dancing playing instruments if you have a pet the location was nice as its directly next door to the maritime park beach is right there along with ghiridelli square and the buena vista for some irish coffees lobby was comfortable to hang out in in the evening nice fireplace we brought our fur baby she was welcomed by all
reviews: really enjoyed our two night stay jeremiah was exceptionally welcoming and was a good man to have out front for those first second third impressions for what we wanted to do as tourists the location was perfect
cleaned_advanced: really enjoyed two night jeremiah exceptionally welcoming good man front first second third impression wanted tourist location perfect

original_reviews: the staff are awesome at this hotel we stayed for a quick two night vacation for my husbands birthday staff were very polite and attentive they even left a package for my husband in the room we loved being able walk to fishermans wharf and were right next to ghirardelli square room was clean and the mini bar is stocked with awesome goodies just in case definitely will stay again
reviews: a wonderful stay in san francisco hotel personnel very friendly and responsif when you book a room state what kind of view you expect rather top than bottom floors were glad that we were able to change arrival dates at very short notice lots of wonderful restaurants just around the corner
cleaned_advanced: wonderful san francisco personnel friendly responsif book state kind view expect rather top bottom floor glad able change arrival date short notice lot wonderful restaurant around corner

original_reviews: we really liked the ambience of this hotel its location is perfect the room was clean and tidy this is a premium style hotel in a a good location so everything costs a bit more and the resort fee is a bone of contention the 10 a day voucher in the bar was the only bit used but we knew this prior to arrival and accepted it would of been nice to have a fridge in the room for personal use charging an extra 15 for an extra fridge is a cheek as the one supplied was for the mini bar the staff were always attentive friendly and very helpful just a note for other travellers when booking the hop on hop off bus take the two day option one day isnt enough
reviews: crazyinluv we greatly appreciate you taking the time to give us a review and giving us a perfect score the entire team is thrilled to had made your stay most enjoyable and memorable since the argonaut is in the middle of fishermans wharf this makes us an ideal location ghirardelli square is a block away hyde st pier is across the street the cable car turn is next to the hotel and pier 39 is just steps away as a added benefit staying with us we also offer two free hours limited availability bike rental from blazing saddle or if you prefer we have electric urbes 10 credit to use in the blue mermaid per a night and discounts with local business such as ben and jerrys and sees candy which is located behind the hotel please come visit us again shortly all the best keith hotel operations manager

original_reviews: we have been to san francisco several times but this was out first stay at the argonaut but it will definitely not be our last it is a lovely hotel in the ideal spot if you want to be in the fishermans wharf area the staff were tremendous we had asked for a room that overlooked the park and we were not disappointed the concierge service is brilliant and a little tip for you if you intend hiring bikes from blazing saddles a few doors down which we would also recommend the argonaut has 8 complimentary bike vouchers each day with them it is a first come first served basis in the morning but we got them both times we asked it isnt the cheapest hotel in the area but you get what you pay for we paid 400 a night for a room that gave us a view of where the cable cars turn round in the park which is what we wanted there can be a bit of noise early in the morning outside so if you like to sleep with your window open just be prepared to be woken up every now and again but it didnt stop us getting a good nights sleep
reviews: we came early to san francisco as we were on a tour that began here the hotel was very nice and the room adequate it is located right in the heart of all the activities so for us this was its best feature only its excessive price kept it from being a 5 star rating but most of the tourist attractions in this area are vastly overpriced so come prepared we asked for the room rate the tour secured but this was tactfully declined
cleaned_advanced: came early san francisco tour began nice adequate located right heart activity u best feature excessive price kept star rating tourist attraction area vastly overpriced come prepared asked rate tour secured tactfully declined

original_reviews: good bits the location the view from our room of the bay and alcatraz the complimentary bottled water at reception bad bits not good value for money our suite was very expensive and the rest of the hotel did not live up to expectations service was non existent we took our own bags to our room no assistance was offered every time we tried to call guest services we got an ai bot that was utterly useless and infuriating the restaurant was average with surly service and very expensive our one and only experience with the concierge on our first morning was so poor we relied on google from there on in she ignored the questions we asked and tried to upsell us on things we werent interested in the one piece of info we did get out of her turned out to be incorrect the hotel is in a beautiful old building but alas feels soulless in the communal areas and there is no sense of a hub staff werent rude but neither were they friendly there was little proactivity there was a lot of chatting amongst themselves while guests stood around waiting for attention overall our stay was not terrible but neither was it great and for the money we spent it wasnt good value so we could not recommend it we were not asked about our stay at checkout i was send a satisfaction questionnaire after leaving which i filled out honestly but the hotel has not followed up about any of our feedback it just felt like they didnt care very much a real shame
reviews: good receptionist and travel guide in hotel lobby good restaurant attached no noises although in busy area rooms spotless and kept so helpful polite staff at all times very happy to recommend cable car turn around right outside hotel buy day rider for best price
cleaned_advanced: good receptionist travel guide lobby good restaurant attached noise although busy area spotless kept helpful polite staff time happy recommend cable car turn around right outside buy day rider best price

original_reviews: close to everything loved the location and surroundings great service by the valet and hotel staff wonderful food at the attached restaurant would have liked a bigger view of the marina window was small
reviews: we recently stayed at this hotel for 2 nights check in was super easy and the staff were really helpful the room was quiet big king size bed a small sofa and a desk the bathroom was pretty average but nice the tv had loads of channels and the mini bar was packed the location was perfect for us just a short walk to pier 39 or a very short drive to the alcatraz cruise dock was we really couldnt rate the location any higher shops and food right at the door step the blue mermaid restaurant downstairs was really nice too the lobby had plenty of seating and some games to play while youre waiting etc we also were given a free 2 hour bike rental with our booking from the shop next door so we got to see the golden gate nice and close we would definitely stay here again highly recommend

original_reviews: my husband and i arrived monday afternoon john and andreas were simply fantastic always willing to take the time to see how we were and helping with suggestions to any questions we had our room had a fantastic view and the champagne and happy honeymoon was such a grand touch loved this stay and will be really sad to say goodbye saturday morning and the rooms are cleanvery very important
reviews: be sure to know which way your room faces you can face the water a nice little courtyard or a lot of rooms simply face in on other rooms with no view at all except your fellow hotel guests the rooms are small but not uncomfortable and if you want to be in the touristy heart of fishermans wharf this is a good place
cleaned_advanced: sure know way face face water nice little courtyard lot simply face view except fellow guest small uncomfortable want touristy heart fisherman wharf good place

original_reviews: very comfortable rooms friendly staff great location in the heart of fishermans wharf there is a ben and jerrys two doors down which you get discount in staying in the argonaut hotel meaning it smells lovely as you walk back and you get to have lovely icecream every day the attached restaurant is expensive id recommend boudins for breakfast instead
reviews: we stayed here on my birthday while on the way to napa valley the hotels location is perfect being that its right on the waterfront i was traveling with my shiba inu and we had a wonderful time playing at aquatic park adjacent to the hotel there is nothing like a walk at sunrise along the waters edge with the golden gate bridge in the background long before the tourists flock the area we stayed in a beautiful very spacious corner suite with a hot tub i particularly appreciated the maritime theme of the hotel with its hardwood floors and exposed brick walls the building itself is a historic san francisco building the hotel staff was extremely friendly from valet to the front desk my dog was also welcomed by everyone whom we encountered i will gladly stay at this property again when traveling with my dog to san francisco ps parking is very steep at 50 a day and you dont need a car if youre just hanging out in the city
cleaned_advanced: stayed birthday way napa valley hotel location perfect right waterfront traveling shiba inu wonderful time playing aquatic park adjacent nothing like walk sunrise along water edge golden gate bridge background long tourist flock area stayed beautiful spacious corner suite hot tub particularly appreciated maritime theme hardwood floor exposed brick wall building historic san francisco building staff extremely friendly valet front desk dog also welcomed everyone encountered gladly property traveling dog san francisco p parking steep day dont need car youre hanging city

original_reviews: spent three nights here and it was a convenient spot for the family easy access to nice restaurants fast food and tourist attractions including a cable car stop next door staff were friendly and free happy hour was a nice treat
reviews: you will definitely love the location and make sure to get a 4th floor room with a view of the bay or golden gate bridge the nautical decor and design of the hotel is great i love the cozy fireplace in the main lobby area with lounge chairs you can sit on during the chilly weather the hotel itself is clean and covid compliant the staff is very nice but can be a bit more engaging the rooms are very clean and made up nicely the bathroom is your basic tubshower combo and cloth curtain i do love the pocket door to the bathroom the sleep however was terrible their beds at least the room we stayed in was a spring mattress which you felt all of them on the thin mattress against the hard base board it was sitting on and made noise every toss and turn you will need to ask the front desk if you want a firmer memory foam pillow instead of the thin feather pillows we found that out on our last night the sleep is the only reason why we would not return but would definitely come back if they upgraded their beds
cleaned_advanced: definitely love location make sure get th floor view bay golden gate bridge nautical decor design great love cozy fireplace main lobby area lounge chair sit chilly weather clean covid compliant staff nice bit engaging clean made nicely bathroom basic tubshower combo cloth curtain love pocket door bathroom sleep however terrible bed least stayed spring mattress felt thin mattress hard base board sitting made noise every toss turn need ask front desk want firmer memory foam pillow instead thin feather pillow found last night sleep reason would return would definitely come back upgraded bed

original_reviews: overall a great experience with this hotel it is at the west end of jefferson street which is the hotspot at fishermans wharf you will be in walking distance of the piers bus tours and the cable cars many restaurants and other activities front desk was very helpful in arranging a car for our transport back to sfo bellmen housekeeping and all other staff were very pleasant and professional this was an excellent experience in san francisco
reviews: this hotel by far is the best hotel for a stay in san francisco located near everything corinne provided exceptional customer service and is the sole reason i will be returning she goes above and beyond the rooms are exquisite and the blue mermaid was phenomenal do not hesitate and book this hotel
cleaned_advanced: far best san francisco located near everything corinne provided exceptional customer service sole reason returning go beyond exquisite blue mermaid phenomenal hesitate book

original_reviews: arriving after a long flight from the uk we found the hotel easily and were welcomed into this lovely and friendly hotel we were originally given a room on the 4th floor 408 but there was a loud noise from some air conditioning units and immediately on requesting a different room was given one no questions no quibbles and very friendly explaining the noise issue these 4th floor rooms with noise are referenced in other reviews too hotel is a great location right next to the cable car terminus on the edge of fishermans wharf and also next to a park and beach so you arent in the middle of and taking ages to escape some of the worst excesses of the fishermans wharf tourist trap its also nice to see fishermans wharf early in the day when there are few tourists about our room 267 was large clean and beds very comfortable happy hour between 56 every night served complimentary wine and beer a great idea after our long days out in sf as a family of 4 we originally booked a double queen room with view for 3 days but then found that it was 200 cheaper for the same type room without a view the windows are quite small this was a good decisionand since we were out most of the day loads of other restuarants and breakfast places nearby so would recommend eating outside the hotel and you can ride the cable cars either earlier or later when its quieter valet parking whilst expensive was a breeze and be assured that is a godsend in sf all in all a great hotel great service great location would we stay there again definitely
reviews: if youre looking for a great holiday location right in the middle of the tourist trap around fishermans wharf then this is your place the nautical theme is everywhere and probably a great family option convenient access to waterfront and cable car into downtown lots of bike rental places nearby hard to escape the tourists so if you want something a little more chilled out you might want to look elsewhere
cleaned_advanced: youre looking great holiday location right middle tourist trap around fisherman wharf place nautical theme everywhere probably great family option convenient access waterfront cable car downtown lot bike rental place nearby hard escape tourist want something little chilled might want look elsewhere

original_reviews: once youre inside it gets less frenetic than on the street but the decor is cheesy blue nautical on the whole a pretty good hotel nice wooden beams the little museum next door is delightful breakfast was ordinary and very expensive stay here if you want to be right in the thick of it
reviews: i stayed with my family in a one bedroom bayview suite the bedroom was spacious and the living room had generous seating a table and chair for four a desk and still plenty of room for a rollaway bed the sofa also converted to a bed very roomy bathroom with nice toiletries and soft towels the room was not sound proof but the hustle and bustle outside calmed down considerably after dark so sleeping was fine calling it a bay view was a little generous as our view was of buildings that lined the bay but we were on the second floor and i suspect the higher floor probably have better views and the view was interesting so really no complaints there fishermans wharf was a little touristy but the hotel was on its edge and therefore quieter but still in close proximity to everything the location is great for public transportation right at the cable car turnaround a block from the bus stop and two blocks from the street car stop the afternoon happy hour was a nice touch and we got very helpful service from the concierge and front desk house keeping was excellent

original_reviews: ive stayed in many sf hotels and picked this one for the location for this trip although the rooms with supposed views had a glimpse of the bay at an angle in the distance front of house staff were friendly and concierge helpful no information on hotel or the city to be found in the rooms room itself was nice furnishings a bit shabby though bathroom very dated and small for the room size adjoining restaurant is ok but limited and not great choice overall the hotel was fine for what i had wanted but not sure id return
reviews: staff was very helpful when i asked help on a couple of issues great service from staff room was exceptionally nice and very clean i would stay here again also a very good location the stay also included parking which was great because it is a very busy area for nightclubs and restaurents and some museums
cleaned_advanced: staff helpful asked help couple issue great service staff exceptionally nice clean would also good location also included parking great busy area nightclub restaurents museum

original_reviews: we went here last minute due to a failed airbnb experience it was the last night of our honeymoon and so the woman checking us in very kindly upgraded us to a huge suite we were so pleased the suite was gorgeous with lots of nice touches like animal print robes and a big jacuzzi bath we didnt have much of a view but we werent too bothered about that seeing as we got the free upgrade the location is brilliant as you can just wander out the front door and within minutes you are at fishermans wharf and pier 39 with views to alcatraz and the golden gate bridge the hotel itself is actually quite funky and there are complimentary guest drinks beer and wine in the lobby each day at 530 we didnt eat in the restaurant so i cant comment on that however we did get breakfast room service which was quite pricey but nice for a treat the staff are what really make this hotel a great experience from the reception desk to the bell hop they all went out of their way to be super friendly and helpful
reviews: great for any trip in and around sf very nice and safe area and also good for jogging swimming and bicycle tours the city is also within walking distance around 30 minutes breakfast can be eaten in the hotel restaurant if it must be glutenfree the kitchen will take special care
cleaned_advanced: great trip around sf nice safe area also good jogging swimming bicycle tour city also within walking distance around minute breakfast eaten restaurant must glutenfree kitchen take special care

original_reviews: we stayed here for a night between our international flights recently we arrived at 830 way before check in and the hotel were very accommodating in looking after our bags and going out of their way to get a room ready early for us gave us a free coffee voucher for the restaurant and arranged for a table for us to have some breakfast reception staff were very friendly giving great help on local transport and where to go they even called me when our room was ready later that morning room was very nice something different from the usual same old same old hotel rooms great to have an opening window for fresh air something that seems to be very unusual these days location is fantastic right next to the tram stop to get you into the city and union square right on fishermans wharf for all the attractions there completly different atmosphere to our earlier stay in sfo and much more enjoyable all round would recomend to anyone and will stay there again when we return
reviews: we very much enjoyed our stay at this hotel recently the rooms were everything that was promised they were decorated in a nautical theme without being over the top we really liked the location right near the hyde street pier and hyde powell street car station the nightly wine reception was very enjoyable as we are able to meet many different people from around the world we met a very nice couple from oslo norway and now have a place to visit should we ever go to the scandinavian countries the staff are very friendly and helpful we spoke with the concierge on numerous occasions and received very good information and advice on the area we have stayed at kimpton hotels before and had very nice stays we would highly recommend the argonaut hotel for anyone looking to stay in the fishermans wharf area
cleaned_advanced: much enjoyed recently everything promised decorated nautical theme without top really liked location right near hyde street pier hyde powell street car station nightly wine reception enjoyable able meet many different people around world met nice couple oslo norway place visit ever go scandinavian country staff friendly helpful spoke concierge numerous occasion received good information advice area stayed kimpton hotel nice stay would highly recommend argonaut anyone looking fisherman wharf area

original_reviews: my wife and i flew from los angeles for a weekend the museum was closed which really was disappointing the weather and hotel were fabulous great trip and all employees were helpful most restaurants and places were open the trolley cars were shut down still the embarcadero was not busy
reviews: decided to stay here for 1 night as we were in transit very warm service nice spacious room with cute decor very apt maritime themed concierge was helpful in arranging for cab to airport for the following day would definitely recommend this place
cleaned_advanced: decided night transit warm service nice spacious cute decor apt maritime themed concierge helpful arranging cab airport following day would definitely recommend place

original_reviews: hotel is located at the hyde and powell turn around close to everything but most importantly its across from the buena vista and their fantastic irish coffees and breakfast besides walking along the embarcadero we walked the opposite direction to the marina district palace of fine arts crissy field ant the golden gate ferry to sausalito just a couple blocks skip scomas and blue mermaid terrible tadich grill gary danko fog city diner yummy
reviews: hotel rooms were nice however very noisy charges for items in room were not reasonable restaurant was terrific and employees were very nice the location was great and walking around was made simple
cleaned_advanced: nice however noisy charge item reasonable restaurant terrific employee nice location great walking around made simple

original_reviews: we stayed here in march for a day trip to san francisico and we loved it the nautical theme is charming with the location pros called for an early checkin hotel was accommodating umbrella in room helpful for the rain great mini bar selection fabulous location near pier 39 quick uber ride to other parts of the city like the golden gate super helpful concierges great view from our room we could see alcatraz cons none we loved it here definitely would stay again
reviews: arrived at the hotel after a long journey the checkin was easy quick painless we were quickly directed to the elevators and up to our room which we were told had a lovely view of the golden gate bridge even though it was not visible at that point the room was bigger than i had expected with the lovely quirky design features it was clean and well appointed it is in a good spot as a base exploring sanfrancisco although the wharf are gets very busy at times we loved sitting on muni pier and watching the sunset over gg bridge the common areas of the hotel are all well decorated clean recommended
cleaned_advanced: arrived long journey checkin easy quick painless quickly directed elevator told lovely view golden gate bridge even though visible point bigger expected lovely quirky design feature clean well appointed good spot base exploring sanfrancisco although wharf get busy time loved sitting muni pier watching sunset gg bridge common area well decorated clean recommended

original_reviews: excellent customer service staff are responsive and knowledgeable spouse is disabled and staff did everything extra to accommodate us the location of the hotel is exciting and scenic i was planning my next stay before even checking out
reviews: the best thing that the argonaut has going for it is the location between ghiradelli square and fishermans wharf its incredibly easy to walk to so many great tourist spots including pier 39 and pier 33 the lobby is lovely with a large fireplace comfy seating and games think upscale connect 4 and tic tac toe our room had a view of the the room across from the courtyard but we were really only there to sleep and we didnt mind also drinks at the fire pit outside at the blue mermaid was a great way to wind down now for the not so great the 25 daily urban resort fee is kind of ridiculous it covers wifi come on and infused water in the lobby which was empty every single time i passed through at least 6 times day next the bathrooms in the rooms are very dated and not laid out exceedingly well the hair dryer hangs on a hook just outside of the shower our shower head made a high pitched squealing noise that we couldnt stop no matter what we tried also prepare for long elevator waits with only 2 slow elevators finally perhaps the most frustrating was the service the representative at check in was flat out rude and also did not disclose the urban facility fee overall there were really great things about the argonaut but really annoying aspects brought the overall experience down great location and if you get a good deal its definitely worth it
cleaned_advanced: best thing argonaut going location ghiradelli square fisherman wharf incredibly easy walk many great tourist spot including pier pier lobby lovely large fireplace comfy seating game think upscale connect tic tac toe view across courtyard really sleep didnt mind also drink fire pit outside blue mermaid great way wind great daily urban resort fee kind ridiculous cover wifi come infused water lobby empty every single time passed least time day next bathroom dated laid exceedingly well hair dryer hang hook outside shower shower head made high pitched squealing noise couldnt stop matter tried also prepare long elevator wait slow elevator finally perhaps frustrating service representative check flat rude also disclose urban facility fee overall really great thing argonaut really annoying aspect brought overall experience great location get good deal definitely worth

original_reviews: 100 will return to the argonaut my family of four visited the property and everything from arrival to departure was wonderful the bell staff jeremiah and jose was efficient and made arrival on the busy street so easy check in was welcoming and informative tzentin sorry if misspelled was wonderful at the front desk while i didnt speak with him in person ky helped me via phone twice which i appreciated very much jenmy at the restaurant was an all star my family loved the chowders especially the crab our room was clean spacious and we loved all of the subtle hints that we were in a ship port mirror star fish pillow etc the gym had really great machines i should also mention that our two dogs who traveled with us enjoyed their pet bed bowls and treats the location of the hotel right next to aquatic park was perfect for walks and seeing the sunset behind the golden gate the service that the argonaut provides is on point personable memorable after a few disappointing stays at different hotels it was so refreshing to receive such great service and a comfortable safe and clean room to come back to at night
reviews: though the argonaut is in a touristy area its a great location if youre a runner or want to take advantage of daily bike rides to the golden gate bridge vouchers provided for free bikes first come first serve beautiful views with some challenging but doable uphills for your run or bike ride also the ferry building is a short bike ride away is a great place to go for breakfast or afternoon oysters we switched rooms upon arrival not wanting to face the street and the staff was very accommodating id stay there again

original_reviews: had a great time this hotel argonaut is excellent in a great place great room trendy bars and reception and very very friendly staff we really did enjoy the hotel and this lovely city 1010 for the hotel david
reviews: i did not know exactly what to expect from the argonaut online pictures are often shot with misleading flattering lighting and angles this is a really nice clean unusual and well run hotel the decor is inventive as it is both retro and modern at the same time the rooms have a do not disturb make up my room switch and a doorbell great idea my only suggestions are better light blocking on the window treatments a way to divert the hvac vent and a larger mini fridge it was so full of their mini bar drinks that i had to remove them to chill my water bottle and dinner leftovers but thats nitpicking

original_reviews: the room was huge and very clean i have never been is such a cool hotel the staff was always happy to help with anything we needed my wife needed a spoon and bowl for her ice cream and the guy with the cool hat brought it up to her the museum was very cool the lounge area was nice to sit and relax before or after a meal at the blue mermaid over all it was an awesome experience
reviews: we stayed here for four nights end of may 2015 it is very conveniently located at fishermans wharf excellent and friendly staff very comfortable and clean roomscomlimentary wifiand free wine between 5 and 6 pm every evening we had a great time
cleaned_advanced: stayed four night end may conveniently located fisherman wharf excellent friendly staff comfortable clean roomscomlimentary wifiand free wine pm every evening great time

original_reviews: recently stayed for 4 nights at this hotel with family and can honestly say great hotel and perfect location hotel service was good and standard and cleanliness of room perfect if staying in san fran and want to be on the wharf this is a perfect hotel
reviews: we stayed here with our 2 young children we had a room with 2 queen size beds before our arrival i emailed to ask if a portable cot could be provided the response i received was that our room package did not include a cot i was annoyed as i booked the room online directly with the hotel so the system knew i had young children travelling with us anyway i asked again on check in and the attitude then was very helpful and we did receive a cot there was a coffee machine but no kettle or tea making facilities which i found interesting also we werent advised of the facilities available to us until we checked out we didnt eat any meals here so i cant comment on that however the little snags did not ruin our stay the hotel is great and the location is superb we found the door staff in particular to be very friendly and helpful i do recommend it to families

original_reviews: really enjoyed our two night stay jeremiah was exceptionally welcoming and was a good man to have out front for those first second third impressions for what we wanted to do as tourists the location was perfect
reviews: this is great place to stay on the slightly touristy fishermans wharf but on the edge and perfectly peaceful inside lovely fresh and clean feel to the rooms valet parking guys very efficient and helpful as you pull up out of the holiday traffic not cheap but would really recommend for a short stay in this wonderful city everything close by and you can wander away from the crowds quite easily as well as stroll along to the sea lions in the peace of the morning
cleaned_advanced: great place slightly touristy fisherman wharf edge perfectly peaceful inside lovely fresh clean feel valet parking guy efficient helpful pull holiday traffic cheap would really recommend short wonderful city everything close wander away crowd quite easily well stroll along sea lion peace morning

original_reviews: a wonderful stay in san francisco hotel personnel very friendly and responsif when you book a room state what kind of view you expect rather top than bottom floors were glad that we were able to change arrival dates at very short notice lots of wonderful restaurants just around the corner
reviews: we had a very pleasant stay at this hotel the overall ambiance was cozy yet modern the nautical touches were stylish the hotel is very clean and the service was excellent a nice restaurant was on the premises the staff were very pleasant the location was excellent minutes from the beach and fishermans wharf
cleaned_advanced: pleasant overall ambiance cozy yet modern nautical touch stylish clean service excellent nice restaurant premise staff pleasant location excellent minute beach fisherman wharf

original_reviews: crazyinluv we greatly appreciate you taking the time to give us a review and giving us a perfect score the entire team is thrilled to had made your stay most enjoyable and memorable since the argonaut is in the middle of fishermans wharf this makes us an ideal location ghirardelli square is a block away hyde st pier is across the street the cable car turn is next to the hotel and pier 39 is just steps away as a added benefit staying with us we also offer two free hours limited availability bike rental from blazing saddle or if you prefer we have electric urbes 10 credit to use in the blue mermaid per a night and discounts with local business such as ben and jerrys and sees candy which is located behind the hotel please come visit us again shortly all the best keith hotel operations manager
reviews: this hotel is ideal for visiting fishermans wharf and also down town san fran as there is a tram stop 1 minutes walk from the hotel plenty of restaurants around the restaurant attached to the hotel is good but a bit pricey
cleaned_advanced: ideal visiting fisherman wharf also town san fran tram stop minute walk plenty restaurant around restaurant attached good bit pricey

original_reviews: we came early to san francisco as we were on a tour that began here the hotel was very nice and the room adequate it is located right in the heart of all the activities so for us this was its best feature only its excessive price kept it from being a 5 star rating but most of the tourist attractions in this area are vastly overpriced so come prepared we asked for the room rate the tour secured but this was tactfully declined
reviews: we stayed here for 3 nights for the first part of our honeymoon check in with travis was friendly and fast we got to our room and realised that it was not the deluxe view room that i had booked i called travis and after a few minutes he realised the mistake and we were moved to a lovely room with a view of the golden gate bridge and cable car turnaround i must all mention that in our original room there was some chocolate a bottle of sparkling wine and a card congratulating us on our marriage very thoughtful our stay was good although the hotel was very busy and noisy due to a hm convention one night we were woken around 2am by the room next door there seemed to be about 10 people in one room carrying on their party it took 3 calls to the front desk to get them silenced the hotel is in the best location and kept very clean and tidy we will consider the argonaut when we return to san francisco a note to the hotel when your guests book through a 3rd party please check their vouchers carefully this is what caused our room mix up and when we returned we also realised that we had a continental breakfast included in our rate but this was never mentioned which is a shame

original_reviews: good receptionist and travel guide in hotel lobby good restaurant attached no noises although in busy area rooms spotless and kept so helpful polite staff at all times very happy to recommend cable car turn around right outside hotel buy day rider for best price
reviews: great hotel in the old cannery in the midst of fishermans wharf rooms are oversized and quiet we were celebrating our anniversary and were surprised by a beautiful welcome gift tray of snacks and wine

original_reviews: we recently stayed at this hotel for 2 nights check in was super easy and the staff were really helpful the room was quiet big king size bed a small sofa and a desk the bathroom was pretty average but nice the tv had loads of channels and the mini bar was packed the location was perfect for us just a short walk to pier 39 or a very short drive to the alcatraz cruise dock was we really couldnt rate the location any higher shops and food right at the door step the blue mermaid restaurant downstairs was really nice too the lobby had plenty of seating and some games to play while youre waiting etc we also were given a free 2 hour bike rental with our booking from the shop next door so we got to see the golden gate nice and close we would definitely stay here again highly recommend
