original_reviews: be sure to know which way your room faces you can face the water a nice little courtyard or a lot of rooms simply face in on other rooms with no view at all except your fellow hotel guests the rooms are small but not uncomfortable and if you want to be in the touristy heart of fishermans wharf this is a good place
reviews: we had a room on level 4 with a window overlooking the bay towards alcatraz whilst there is some street noise during the day and early evening we had no issues with sleep during our 5 days service from the staff is exceptional from the moment you pull up at the kerb the rooms are well appointed with everything a traveler needs very comfortable as the hotel is at the hyde st end of the wharf you are far enough away from the really busy tourist spots but only a 10 minute walk to pier 39 as well as a short walk to the hyde st trolley terminus which takes you right past lombard st it might look only 4 blocks away but the uphill walk is very very steep take the trolley and into the shopping district near union square the attached restaurant blue mermaid provides options all day with the breakfast menu a highlight offering full alacarte or just simple sides to make up a meal which was good value highly recommend staying here if you are visiting the sf area

reviews: location was perfect for exploring fishermans wharf staff was very friendly and helpful concierge and doormen had lots of excellent information and help maritime museum next door was excellent and is free a trolley stop is across the street along with a park next to the bay where we sat at night and listened to the waves excellent restaurant blue mermaid inside hotel hotel is at the west end of the area so is convenient yet very quiet room decor was fun and so was the doormans vintage navy uniform the fireplace in the lobby area was a welcome stop after a brisk night of sightseeing

original_reviews: if youre looking for a great holiday location right in the middle of the tourist trap around fishermans wharf then this is your place the nautical theme is everywhere and probably a great family option convenient access to waterfront and cable car into downtown lots of bike rental places nearby hard to escape the tourists so if you want something a little more chilled out you might want to look elsewhere
reviews: a wonderful hotel one of the best hotels ive ever stayed in small touches make all the difference to the hotel experience situated in a great location its quiet in the evening and felt safe walking around at night staff were helpful professional and friendly we are thinking of coming back to san fransisco and i honestly wouldnt want to stay anywhere else
cleaned_advanced: wonderful one best hotel ive ever stayed small touch make difference experience situated great location quiet evening felt safe walking around night staff helpful professional friendly thinking coming back san fransisco honestly wouldnt want anywhere else

original_reviews: i stayed with my family in a one bedroom bayview suite the bedroom was spacious and the living room had generous seating a table and chair for four a desk and still plenty of room for a rollaway bed the sofa also converted to a bed very roomy bathroom with nice toiletries and soft towels the room was not sound proof but the hustle and bustle outside calmed down considerably after dark so sleeping was fine calling it a bay view was a little generous as our view was of buildings that lined the bay but we were on the second floor and i suspect the higher floor probably have better views and the view was interesting so really no complaints there fishermans wharf was a little touristy but the hotel was on its edge and therefore quieter but still in close proximity to everything the location is great for public transportation right at the cable car turnaround a block from the bus stop and two blocks from the street car stop the afternoon happy hour was a nice touch and we got very helpful service from the concierge and front desk house keeping was excellent
reviews: great spot to stay location is great to everything the hotel staff was great and gave recommendations to several spots this hotel was through a travel agent and was a great choice would stay here again if i can to san francisco
cleaned_advanced: great spot location great everything staff great gave recommendation several spot travel agent great choice would san francisco

original_reviews: staff was very helpful when i asked help on a couple of issues great service from staff room was exceptionally nice and very clean i would stay here again also a very good location the stay also included parking which was great because it is a very busy area for nightclubs and restaurents and some museums
reviews: the hotel is located in what was once the del monte cannery it was the first building built entirely of recycled brick from the 1906 san francisco earthquake the hotel has a nautical theme the rooms are not the largest i have ever stayed in but are big compared to some of the other hotels ive stayed at in san francisco the rooms are well decorated and equipped the location is super you are right on the street that parallels the bay right next door almost to ghirardelli square fishermans wharf is about a 10 to 15minute leisurely walk away the downside might be that it is quite an active area being so close to the bay and wharf besides the restaurant in the hotel restaurants abound within walking distance the turnaround for the hyde street cable car is less than a block away i would stay here again be warned this is not a budget hotel my rate was 341 + tax per night however it was not out of the range of other hotels in the area especially considering its location a car is not needed for the most part as all wharf attractions are within walking distance union square can be reached via the hyde street cable car less than a block away the tour i booked actually had a pickup from the hotel
cleaned_advanced: located del monte cannery first building built entirely recycled brick san francisco earthquake nautical theme largest ever stayed big compared hotel ive stayed san francisco well decorated equipped location super right street parallel bay right next door almost ghirardelli square fisherman wharf minute leisurely walk away downside might quite active area close bay wharf besides restaurant restaurant abound within walking distance turnaround hyde street cable car less block away would warned budget rate tax per night however range hotel area especially considering location car needed part wharf attraction within walking distance union square reached via hyde street cable car less block away tour booked actually pickup

original_reviews: great for any trip in and around sf very nice and safe area and also good for jogging swimming and bicycle tours the city is also within walking distance around 30 minutes breakfast can be eaten in the hotel restaurant if it must be glutenfree the kitchen will take special care
reviews: i met my bf in san francisco this hotel is beautiful the argonaut hotel is across the street from the fishermans warf it is near the cable car as well we used uber to navigate around sf you can also rent bikes if thats your thing the hotel is not a far ride from pier 39 a must see the pier larger than it looks the room was very clean and the staff were amazing marvin was a great help with answering questions we had about the area if youre a person who is fond of garlic i would suggest trying the stinking rose all of their dishes are made with garlic even the desserts within walking distance is scomas they had the freshest seafood that ive had in a long time thank u jean marc at scomas i will definitely be back to the argonaut hotel love love love san fran
cleaned_advanced: met bf san francisco beautiful argonaut across street fisherman warf near cable car well used uber navigate around sf also rent bike thats thing far ride pier must see pier larger look clean staff amazing marvin great help answering question area youre person fond garlic would suggest trying stinking rose dish made garlic even dessert within walking distance scomas freshest seafood ive long time thank jean marc scomas definitely back argonaut love love love san fran

original_reviews: we very much enjoyed our stay at this hotel recently the rooms were everything that was promised they were decorated in a nautical theme without being over the top we really liked the location right near the hyde street pier and hyde powell street car station the nightly wine reception was very enjoyable as we are able to meet many different people from around the world we met a very nice couple from oslo norway and now have a place to visit should we ever go to the scandinavian countries the staff are very friendly and helpful we spoke with the concierge on numerous occasions and received very good information and advice on the area we have stayed at kimpton hotels before and had very nice stays we would highly recommend the argonaut hotel for anyone looking to stay in the fishermans wharf area
reviews: great location great service nice area to meet in the lobby to wait for friends or just hang before we all went back to our own rooms hotel was very helpful with securing tickets for sights that were sold out
cleaned_advanced: great location great service nice area meet lobby wait friend hang went back helpful securing ticket sight sold

original_reviews: decided to stay here for 1 night as we were in transit very warm service nice spacious room with cute decor very apt maritime themed concierge was helpful in arranging for cab to airport for the following day would definitely recommend this place
reviews: we stayed here as part of our honeymoon the room was nicely furnished and kept clean throughout our stay all the staff were friendly and helpful and couldnt have done enough for us we felt that the hotel is perfectly situated on the edge of fishermans wharf if thats where you want to stay we often went walking running or cycling in the mornings to golden gate bridge and didnt need to herd through the hustle and bustle of the tourist trap that is fishermans wharf the cable cars are right next to the hotel and so is ghirardellis the only things that we were disappointed with were the views there was none at all not even a street plus the noise the walls were paper thin where you could clearly here conversations next door not great on a busy weekend
cleaned_advanced: stayed part honeymoon nicely furnished kept clean throughout staff friendly helpful couldnt done enough u felt perfectly situated edge fisherman wharf thats want often went walking running cycling morning golden gate bridge didnt need herd hustle bustle tourist trap fisherman wharf cable car right next ghirardellis thing disappointed view none even street plus noise wall paper thin could clearly conversation next door great busy weekend

original_reviews: hotel rooms were nice however very noisy charges for items in room were not reasonable restaurant was terrific and employees were very nice the location was great and walking around was made simple
reviews: me and my girlfriend spent the weekend here for my birthday and had a wonderful time all the hotel staff were great most notably indy who was very knowledgeable and lead us to finding some amazing local views and food indy was a true professional with his jolly attitude making our stay very pleasant the beds were comfortable and the hotel was in a great convenient location that we felt safe walking around the views were spectacular and made for a memorable trip their blue mermaid restaurant is definitely worth a stop as well
cleaned_advanced: girlfriend spent weekend birthday wonderful time staff great notably indy knowledgeable lead u finding amazing local view food indy true professional jolly attitude making pleasant bed comfortable great convenient location felt safe walking around view spectacular made memorable trip blue mermaid restaurant definitely worth stop well

original_reviews: arrived at the hotel after a long journey the checkin was easy quick painless we were quickly directed to the elevators and up to our room which we were told had a lovely view of the golden gate bridge even though it was not visible at that point the room was bigger than i had expected with the lovely quirky design features it was clean and well appointed it is in a good spot as a base exploring sanfrancisco although the wharf are gets very busy at times we loved sitting on muni pier and watching the sunset over gg bridge the common areas of the hotel are all well decorated clean recommended
reviews: despite the fact that is ideally located the nautical decor of the rooms give you the coziness every tourist looks for i would definitely stay here again highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for walkable distance to the best attractions san francisco has to offer
cleaned_advanced: despite fact ideally located nautical decor give coziness every tourist look would definitely highly recommend anyone looking walkable distance best attraction san francisco offer

original_reviews: the best thing that the argonaut has going for it is the location between ghiradelli square and fishermans wharf its incredibly easy to walk to so many great tourist spots including pier 39 and pier 33 the lobby is lovely with a large fireplace comfy seating and games think upscale connect 4 and tic tac toe our room had a view of the the room across from the courtyard but we were really only there to sleep and we didnt mind also drinks at the fire pit outside at the blue mermaid was a great way to wind down now for the not so great the 25 daily urban resort fee is kind of ridiculous it covers wifi come on and infused water in the lobby which was empty every single time i passed through at least 6 times day next the bathrooms in the rooms are very dated and not laid out exceedingly well the hair dryer hangs on a hook just outside of the shower our shower head made a high pitched squealing noise that we couldnt stop no matter what we tried also prepare for long elevator waits with only 2 slow elevators finally perhaps the most frustrating was the service the representative at check in was flat out rude and also did not disclose the urban facility fee overall there were really great things about the argonaut but really annoying aspects brought the overall experience down great location and if you get a good deal its definitely worth it
reviews: the only issue we had was with the air conditioning as soon as we let them know they sent someone right away to get it fixed by the time we came back from shopping it was running great there was never any question or issue with the staff
cleaned_advanced: issue air conditioning soon let know sent someone right away get fixed time came back shopping running great never question issue staff

original_reviews: though the argonaut is in a touristy area its a great location if youre a runner or want to take advantage of daily bike rides to the golden gate bridge vouchers provided for free bikes first come first serve beautiful views with some challenging but doable uphills for your run or bike ride also the ferry building is a short bike ride away is a great place to go for breakfast or afternoon oysters we switched rooms upon arrival not wanting to face the street and the staff was very accommodating id stay there again
reviews: the room was very spacious and inviting the tub was big enough for 2 and the hotel even included some bath bombs to try out with the spa jets it was an enjoying bath we had a room that over looked alcatraz and golden gate bridge we even saw some seagulls that perched on the building across from us we were minutes from exploring the pier and the chocolate factory overall a great experience
cleaned_advanced: spacious inviting tub big enough even included bath bomb try spa jet enjoying bath looked alcatraz golden gate bridge even saw seagull perched building across u minute exploring pier chocolate factory overall great experience

original_reviews: i did not know exactly what to expect from the argonaut online pictures are often shot with misleading flattering lighting and angles this is a really nice clean unusual and well run hotel the decor is inventive as it is both retro and modern at the same time the rooms have a do not disturb make up my room switch and a doorbell great idea my only suggestions are better light blocking on the window treatments a way to divert the hvac vent and a larger mini fridge it was so full of their mini bar drinks that i had to remove them to chill my water bottle and dinner leftovers but thats nitpicking
reviews: the argon hotel is a great location to be in the middle of all the attractions of sf it is a short walk from pier 39 union square and a short cab to professional sports games the lobby man prince was precise and pleasant in helping us with our luggage and questions would return again
cleaned_advanced: argon great location middle attraction sf short walk pier union square short cab professional sport game lobby man prince precise pleasant helping u luggage question would return

original_reviews: we stayed here for four nights end of may 2015 it is very conveniently located at fishermans wharf excellent and friendly staff very comfortable and clean roomscomlimentary wifiand free wine between 5 and 6 pm every evening we had a great time
reviews: i stayed at the argonaut with my family for two days and it was great the wharf was beautiful not too noisy and very touristy we were greeted by prince who took care of our luggage and explained how the hotel worked he was very nice spoke french for my parents to understand and had a very positive vibe he took us to our room and again was very sweet because of the service and the great rooms id love to come back to this hotel hopefully prince will still be there
cleaned_advanced: stayed argonaut family two day great wharf beautiful noisy touristy greeted prince took care luggage explained worked nice spoke french parent understand positive vibe took u sweet service great id love come back hopefully prince still

original_reviews: we stayed here with our 2 young children we had a room with 2 queen size beds before our arrival i emailed to ask if a portable cot could be provided the response i received was that our room package did not include a cot i was annoyed as i booked the room online directly with the hotel so the system knew i had young children travelling with us anyway i asked again on check in and the attitude then was very helpful and we did receive a cot there was a coffee machine but no kettle or tea making facilities which i found interesting also we werent advised of the facilities available to us until we checked out we didnt eat any meals here so i cant comment on that however the little snags did not ruin our stay the hotel is great and the location is superb we found the door staff in particular to be very friendly and helpful i do recommend it to families
reviews: we thought this location was amazing close the fishermans wharf ghirardelli buena vista so much in close walking proximity we paid for the water view and were assigned to a room on the 2nd floor which didnt provide much of a view so we asked to be reassigned they happily accommodated our request honestly if youre not on a higher floor the water view price is not worth it in our first room we were able to see about an inch of the water the second room was much better we were very happy with our stay and would likely stay again
cleaned_advanced: thought location amazing close fisherman wharf ghirardelli buena vista much close walking proximity paid water view assigned nd floor didnt provide much view asked reassigned happily accommodated request honestly youre higher floor water view price worth first able see inch water second much better happy would likely

original_reviews: this is great place to stay on the slightly touristy fishermans wharf but on the edge and perfectly peaceful inside lovely fresh and clean feel to the rooms valet parking guys very efficient and helpful as you pull up out of the holiday traffic not cheap but would really recommend for a short stay in this wonderful city everything close by and you can wander away from the crowds quite easily as well as stroll along to the sea lions in the peace of the morning
reviews: the room was beautiful the people working there were all friendly from bell boys to front desk to maids etc and helpful we had a view of the golden gate bridge from our bay view room we needed a few additional items in our room like extra wine glasses robes and coffee cups and they were delivered in no time best of all the rooms was so quiet im a light sleeper so thats important no street noise once the windows were closed and very little hall noise you could barely hear the shower or toilet flush when someone was in the bathroom
cleaned_advanced: beautiful people working friendly bell boy front desk maid etc helpful view golden gate bridge bay view needed additional item like extra wine glass robe coffee cup delivered time best quiet im light sleeper thats important street noise window closed little hall noise could barely hear shower toilet flush someone bathroom

original_reviews: we had a very pleasant stay at this hotel the overall ambiance was cozy yet modern the nautical touches were stylish the hotel is very clean and the service was excellent a nice restaurant was on the premises the staff were very pleasant the location was excellent minutes from the beach and fishermans wharf
reviews: this hotel was recommended and booked by our local tagreat choicethe location was excellent and the room facilities were all we needed and morestaff were so friendly and helpfulwhen they heard we were on a trip for our golden wedding they gave us a small gift from the hotel i could recommend this hotel to anyone planning to visit the area
cleaned_advanced: recommended booked local tagreat choicethe location excellent facility needed morestaff friendly helpfulwhen heard trip golden wedding gave u small gift could recommend anyone planning visit area

original_reviews: this hotel is ideal for visiting fishermans wharf and also down town san fran as there is a tram stop 1 minutes walk from the hotel plenty of restaurants around the restaurant attached to the hotel is good but a bit pricey
reviews: very good location and a really nice comfortable room restaurant and bar were excellent we ate breakfast here twice and it was good with a good choice the ciopinno was excellent will definitely stay here again
cleaned_advanced: good location really nice comfortable restaurant bar excellent ate breakfast twice good good choice ciopinno excellent definitely

original_reviews: we stayed here for 3 nights for the first part of our honeymoon check in with travis was friendly and fast we got to our room and realised that it was not the deluxe view room that i had booked i called travis and after a few minutes he realised the mistake and we were moved to a lovely room with a view of the golden gate bridge and cable car turnaround i must all mention that in our original room there was some chocolate a bottle of sparkling wine and a card congratulating us on our marriage very thoughtful our stay was good although the hotel was very busy and noisy due to a hm convention one night we were woken around 2am by the room next door there seemed to be about 10 people in one room carrying on their party it took 3 calls to the front desk to get them silenced the hotel is in the best location and kept very clean and tidy we will consider the argonaut when we return to san francisco a note to the hotel when your guests book through a 3rd party please check their vouchers carefully this is what caused our room mix up and when we returned we also realised that we had a continental breakfast included in our rate but this was never mentioned which is a shame
reviews: hotel is in great location right on the wharf we rented a car because we were also visiting family on the other side of the bay but id recommend against it as this is a very busy area with lots of pedestrians the location is in the heart of many attractions including ghirardelli lombard street boats to alcatraz and fishermens wharf i love the kimpton hotels for their quirkiness and this was no different appears to be original brickwork in rooms nice deep tub we rented a king suit and it was plenty big for two adults and child now for the negatives the room was oddly shaped and seemed to have a lot of wasted space it was more like one large l shaped room with the end of the l being nothing but the entry way and a small sitting table it was clean but looks like it is ready for a remodel shower door barely opened and closed needs new paint the restaurant food was not good and the restaurant looked like it needed to be cleaned my other issue was with the concierge we had not booked tickets to alcatraz but my daughter wanted to go i asked the concierge and was told to check back the next day and she may have tickets that morning she walked me down to a guy who i figured later was a ticket broker who sent me to another guy where i paid 90 per person for a bay cruise and alcatraz tickets separate tours but i had no choice the face value for each tour was 30 which i didnt realize until after i had paid so basically i had paid an 270 for tours 2 tours for 3 people i could have paid 180 for since the bay tours werent sold out and i could have gotten those at any time i was really paying double to go to alcatraz im not so bothered that i had to pay more than face value since it was my mistake in not booking in advance but did not like that the concierge did not explain to me ahead of time that she was taking me to a broker she simply told me to follow her as if she had some connection to get tickets had i known ahead of time i might have negotiated if negotiation was not an option the concierge should have explained to me the price ahead of time including that it was a markup and made the deal for me minor issue but it kind of bothered me in sum id recommend this hotel if you want to stay in this area but i wouldnt go out of my way to stay there
cleaned_advanced: great location right wharf rented car also visiting family side bay id recommend busy area lot pedestrian location heart many attraction including ghirardelli lombard street boat alcatraz fishermens wharf love kimpton hotel quirkiness different appears original brickwork nice deep tub rented king suit plenty big two adult child negative oddly shaped seemed lot wasted space like one large shaped end nothing entry way small sitting table clean look like ready remodel shower door barely opened closed need new paint restaurant food good restaurant looked like needed cleaned issue concierge booked ticket alcatraz daughter wanted go asked concierge told check back next day may ticket morning walked guy figured later ticket broker sent another guy paid per person bay cruise alcatraz ticket separate tour choice face value tour didnt realize paid basically paid tour tour people could paid since bay tour werent sold could gotten time really paying double go alcatraz im bothered pay face value since mistake booking advance like concierge explain ahead time taking broker simply told follow connection get ticket known ahead time might negotiated negotiation option concierge explained price ahead time including markup made deal minor issue kind bothered sum id recommend want area wouldnt go way

original_reviews: great hotel in the old cannery in the midst of fishermans wharf rooms are oversized and quiet we were celebrating our anniversary and were surprised by a beautiful welcome gift tray of snacks and wine
reviews: great location close to pier 39 fishermans wharf and loads of restaurants what you would expect of a 4 star hotel clean and comfortable and staff friendly and helpful breakfast was good in the hotel restaurant there is a small museum part of the hotel which is worth a quick look and is free
cleaned_advanced: great location close pier fisherman wharf load restaurant would expect star clean comfortable staff friendly helpful breakfast good restaurant small museum part worth quick look free

original_reviews: we came to san francisco for 3 days with my two teenagers and this was the perfect place to stay super convenient location to everything the hotel was clean and very accessible close to the golden gate bridge trolleys lombard streeteverything for a tourist we would definitely stay here again
reviews: we loved the amiance as soon as we walked in charming great location if you are looking to stay in this area we had a fantastic water view we were offered our choice of a bridge or alcatraz view easy walk to pier 39 ghiradelli square and the buena vista for irish coffee the street cars and the cable cars they gave a credit in the restaraunt and shops the rooms were cute bathrooms very small and the walls were thin but those things are to be expected in a more historic building our only problem was that we couldnt get a luggage rack in the room to put the suitcase on i have some physical limitations at the moment and that was problematic but otherwise we really enjoyed our stay here
cleaned_advanced: loved amiance soon walked charming great location looking area fantastic water view offered choice bridge alcatraz view easy walk pier ghiradelli square buena vista irish coffee street car cable car gave credit restaraunt shop cute bathroom small wall thin thing expected historic building problem couldnt get luggage rack put suitcase physical limitation moment problematic otherwise really enjoyed

original_reviews: we had a room on level 4 with a window overlooking the bay towards alcatraz whilst there is some street noise during the day and early evening we had no issues with sleep during our 5 days service from the staff is exceptional from the moment you pull up at the kerb the rooms are well appointed with everything a traveler needs very comfortable as the hotel is at the hyde st end of the wharf you are far enough away from the really busy tourist spots but only a 10 minute walk to pier 39 as well as a short walk to the hyde st trolley terminus which takes you right past lombard st it might look only 4 blocks away but the uphill walk is very very steep take the trolley and into the shopping district near union square the attached restaurant blue mermaid provides options all day with the breakfast menu a highlight offering full alacarte or just simple sides to make up a meal which was good value highly recommend staying here if you are visiting the sf area
reviews: heres to another great stay at the argonaut hotel we stayed here for 4 nights in a king suite which fit 5 adults comfortably both the bedroom with a king bed and the livingdining room area are spacious and clean there is a sofa bed in the living room and we requested two rollaway beds for our sons and nephew to sleep on the suite is exactly as described on the website the bathroom was large and had enough counter space to fit all our toiletries the staff from the bell desk valet front desk concierge and housekeeping were so friendly and helpful the hotel is conveniently located next to the cable car turnaround and aquatic park it is within walking distance to ghirardelli square and of course the many shops and eateries on fishermans wharf there is the blue mermaid restaurant in the hotel and we must say the service this time was consistently on point once again our stay was very pleasant and enjoyable will be back again
cleaned_advanced: here another great argonaut stayed night king suite fit adult comfortably bedroom king bed livingdining area spacious clean sofa bed living requested two rollaway bed son nephew sleep suite exactly described website bathroom large enough counter space fit toiletry staff bell desk valet front desk concierge housekeeping friendly helpful conveniently located next cable car turnaround aquatic park within walking distance ghirardelli square course many shop eatery fisherman wharf blue mermaid restaurant must say service time consistently point pleasant enjoyable back

original_reviews: cozy room right at the end of fishermans wharf and next door to one of the trolley turn tables great location for walking everywhere room could have been a bit cleaner but i was only there for one night need to actually use the vacuum was there for a business meeting and they were very accommodating and sleeping was actually quiet considering i was on basementstreet level
reviews: good location for the bay and piers but some distance from main shopping areassites though these can be reached by adjacent cable car service of taxi uber staff helpful but a little distant comfortable well equipped room can be a little noisy around the hotel expensive food and services
cleaned_advanced: good location bay pier distance main shopping areassites though reached adjacent cable car service taxi uber staff helpful little distant comfortable well equipped little noisy around expensive food service

original_reviews: great location great service loved the room nice soft beds the door man was more than helpful when we needed a cab very quickly the bikes were so much fun the concierge was helpful and so kind to my teenage daughters they still talk about how well they were treated we walked to ghiradellis the cable car and wharf from the hotel
reviews: this hotel is perfectly situated for a visit to sfo it is at the quiet end of fishermans wharf next to and part of the national park service property the service is friendly helpful and accessible without being overbearing rooms are adequate in size and well and very comfortably furnished reading lights are good desk is comfortable and adequate to do work maritime themed decor is fresh and comfortable beds and pillows are great we didnt take advantage of it but dogs are welcome
cleaned_advanced: perfectly situated visit sfo quiet end fisherman wharf next part national park service property service friendly helpful accessible without overbearing adequate size well comfortably furnished reading light good desk comfortable adequate work maritime themed decor fresh comfortable bed pillow great didnt take advantage dog welcome

original_reviews: location was perfect for exploring fishermans wharf staff was very friendly and helpful concierge and doormen had lots of excellent information and help maritime museum next door was excellent and is free a trolley stop is across the street along with a park next to the bay where we sat at night and listened to the waves excellent restaurant blue mermaid inside hotel hotel is at the west end of the area so is convenient yet very quiet room decor was fun and so was the doormans vintage navy uniform the fireplace in the lobby area was a welcome stop after a brisk night of sightseeing
reviews: lovely stay at this very neatly appointed hotel decor is nautical theme they offer a cute plush toy sea lion on the beds when you arrive nicely located next to the starting point of the hyde line of cable cars that take you to lombard street and union square also at one end of all the shopping and restaurants near fishermans wharf good food at the restaurant but just across the street are more options and the maritime national historic park is adjacent
cleaned_advanced: lovely neatly appointed decor nautical theme offer cute plush toy sea lion bed arrive nicely located next starting point hyde line cable car take lombard street union square also one end shopping restaurant near fisherman wharf good food restaurant across street option maritime national historic park adjacent

original_reviews: a wonderful hotel one of the best hotels ive ever stayed in small touches make all the difference to the hotel experience situated in a great location its quiet in the evening and felt safe walking around at night staff were helpful professional and friendly we are thinking of coming back to san fransisco and i honestly wouldnt want to stay anywhere else
reviews: we booked this hotel because it was within walking distance of a wedding venue we were attending we booked the argonaut suite and were pleasantly surprised at how large this suite was we had plenty of room for the two of us plus visitors the bathroom was massive there were a lot of windows giving as a 180 degree view of fishermans wharf and ghirardelli squaretrolley area we loved that the wc was behind its own door so that if someone want to utilize the rest of the bathroom while someone needed the wc both could be easily accommodated the shower and sunken tub were separate the tub had a wonderful view of fishermans wharf i just cannot say enough things about this property and its location we checked in around 11pm and it was breeze the front desk and bell desk personal were super friendly and inviting the hotel is conveniently located in fishermans wharf near ghirardelli square you can easily get on the tolley or muni to get around if you dont want to walk or catch a ride from our 5 days here we noticed that all of the staff were super friendly and accommodating should we need to stay in this part of san francisco again we will stay at this property the hotel decor is nautical theme with octopus tentacle wallpaper in the bathroom they even have deck chairs to lounge on in the lobby port holes near the elevators part of a boat in the lobby etc super cute
cleaned_advanced: booked within walking distance wedding venue attending booked argonaut suite pleasantly surprised large suite plenty two u plus visitor bathroom massive lot window giving degree view fisherman wharf ghirardelli squaretrolley area loved wc behind door someone want utilize rest bathroom someone needed wc could easily accommodated shower sunken tub separate tub wonderful view fisherman wharf cannot say enough thing property location checked around pm breeze front desk bell desk personal super friendly inviting conveniently located fisherman wharf near ghirardelli square easily get tolley muni get around dont want walk catch ride day noticed staff super friendly accommodating need part san francisco property decor nautical theme octopus tentacle wallpaper bathroom even deck chair lounge lobby port hole near elevator part boat lobby etc super cute

original_reviews: great spot to stay location is great to everything the hotel staff was great and gave recommendations to several spots this hotel was through a travel agent and was a great choice would stay here again if i can to san francisco
reviews: just a fyi and this may be one you already know this hotel is right by the wharf and is in great walking distances of a lot of cool places and shops however it is very touristy and busy the early morning is the only time there isnt a crowd around this area the inside of the hotel is very nice customer service check in and check out wasnt the best but the nice gentleman that brought up our room service was very polite they hotel is very nice on the inside but we were able to hear our neighbors some we didnt have a view at all so if you want one even of the city make sure to book with a view the beds were very comfortable the bathroom was very nice too and i loved their soap it smelled wonderful they also have battery powered bikes that you can rent and its attached to part of the maritime museum all in all i liked this hotel
cleaned_advanced: fyi may one already know right wharf great walking distance lot cool place shop however touristy busy early morning time isnt crowd around area inside nice customer service check check wasnt best nice gentleman brought service polite nice inside able hear neighbor didnt view want one even city make sure book view bed comfortable bathroom nice loved soap smelled wonderful also battery powered bike rent attached part maritime museum liked

original_reviews: the hotel is located in what was once the del monte cannery it was the first building built entirely of recycled brick from the 1906 san francisco earthquake the hotel has a nautical theme the rooms are not the largest i have ever stayed in but are big compared to some of the other hotels ive stayed at in san francisco the rooms are well decorated and equipped the location is super you are right on the street that parallels the bay right next door almost to ghirardelli square fishermans wharf is about a 10 to 15minute leisurely walk away the downside might be that it is quite an active area being so close to the bay and wharf besides the restaurant in the hotel restaurants abound within walking distance the turnaround for the hyde street cable car is less than a block away i would stay here again be warned this is not a budget hotel my rate was 341 + tax per night however it was not out of the range of other hotels in the area especially considering its location a car is not needed for the most part as all wharf attractions are within walking distance union square can be reached via the hyde street cable car less than a block away the tour i booked actually had a pickup from the hotel
reviews: we were here 3 nights on a hotwire deal it was a great price for the area i do feel that the cheaper rooms are given in the noisiest areas on friday night it was very loud outside due to crowds in fishermans wharf area thankfully i had earplugs the other two weekend nights were not as bad we were on 4th floor and could also still hear traffic noise beds were comfortable room very clean staff very helpful and efficient we had oversized pickup truck so daily parking was almost 70 with taxes we knew this going in so were not surprised but it does seem very excessive
cleaned_advanced: night hotwire deal great price area feel cheaper given noisiest area friday night loud outside due crowd fisherman wharf area thankfully earplug two weekend night bad th floor could also still hear traffic noise bed comfortable clean staff helpful efficient oversized pickup truck daily parking almost tax knew going surprised seem excessive

original_reviews: i met my bf in san francisco this hotel is beautiful the argonaut hotel is across the street from the fishermans warf it is near the cable car as well we used uber to navigate around sf you can also rent bikes if thats your thing the hotel is not a far ride from pier 39 a must see the pier larger than it looks the room was very clean and the staff were amazing marvin was a great help with answering questions we had about the area if youre a person who is fond of garlic i would suggest trying the stinking rose all of their dishes are made with garlic even the desserts within walking distance is scomas they had the freshest seafood that ive had in a long time thank u jean marc at scomas i will definitely be back to the argonaut hotel love love love san fran
reviews: stayed at the argonaut hotel for the third time the location is outstanding the property is very well kept and the staff is very professional and friendly there is no better place to stay in the fishmans wharf area
cleaned_advanced: stayed argonaut third time location outstanding property well kept staff professional friendly better place fishmans wharf area

original_reviews: great location great service nice area to meet in the lobby to wait for friends or just hang before we all went back to our own rooms hotel was very helpful with securing tickets for sights that were sold out
reviews: we book a standard room and when we came in our room i was very surprised the room is very big and nice there is mini bar which is ful 2 bottles of water for free free wifi stuff on reception are very nice and help always the position is close to the sea perfect u can find a lot of shops for tourists and a lot of restaurants also in the hotel there is a restaurant we didnt eat there but we saw menu and prices are good than behind hotel there is a starbucks where u can have breakfast or there is also breakfast in restaurant at 45 pm in lobby everybody drinking beer and wine nice atmosphere hotel is big room is nice just they have very strange bathrobe it was leopard and giraffe
cleaned_advanced: book standard came surprised big nice mini bar ful bottle water free free wifi stuff reception nice help always position close sea perfect find lot shop tourist lot restaurant also restaurant didnt eat saw menu price good behind starbucks breakfast also breakfast restaurant pm lobby everybody drinking beer wine nice atmosphere big nice strange bathrobe leopard giraffe

original_reviews: we stayed here as part of our honeymoon the room was nicely furnished and kept clean throughout our stay all the staff were friendly and helpful and couldnt have done enough for us we felt that the hotel is perfectly situated on the edge of fishermans wharf if thats where you want to stay we often went walking running or cycling in the mornings to golden gate bridge and didnt need to herd through the hustle and bustle of the tourist trap that is fishermans wharf the cable cars are right next to the hotel and so is ghirardellis the only things that we were disappointed with were the views there was none at all not even a street plus the noise the walls were paper thin where you could clearly here conversations next door not great on a busy weekend
reviews: great location great service concierge was extremely helpful i am handicapped and have mobility issues she recommended tours that were easy for me the tour was amazing we saw things i never would have been able to see without her services close to cable cars too would definitely recommend and would definitely stay here again
cleaned_advanced: great location great service concierge extremely helpful handicapped mobility issue recommended tour easy tour amazing saw thing never would able see without service close cable car would definitely recommend would definitely

original_reviews: me and my girlfriend spent the weekend here for my birthday and had a wonderful time all the hotel staff were great most notably indy who was very knowledgeable and lead us to finding some amazing local views and food indy was a true professional with his jolly attitude making our stay very pleasant the beds were comfortable and the hotel was in a great convenient location that we felt safe walking around the views were spectacular and made for a memorable trip their blue mermaid restaurant is definitely worth a stop as well
reviews: unique nautical hotel a great stay in sf near pier 39 however parking is 65 per night ugh we enjoyed the mermaid restaurant and the wine bar on site the staff was very helpful and it is walking distance to many great areas
cleaned_advanced: unique nautical great sf near pier however parking per night ugh enjoyed mermaid restaurant wine bar site staff helpful walking distance many great area

original_reviews: despite the fact that is ideally located the nautical decor of the rooms give you the coziness every tourist looks for i would definitely stay here again highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for walkable distance to the best attractions san francisco has to offer
reviews: wonderful hotel near of all the attractions amazing restaurant and the rooms so comfortable pet friendly parking a bit expensive but worth it location is the best we will be back next year property manager was so nice too with an incident that we had
cleaned_advanced: wonderful near attraction amazing restaurant comfortable pet friendly parking bit expensive worth location best back next year property manager nice incident

original_reviews: the only issue we had was with the air conditioning as soon as we let them know they sent someone right away to get it fixed by the time we came back from shopping it was running great there was never any question or issue with the staff
reviews: perfect location near pier 39 and all the attractions staff very efficient they printed our boarding passes no problem room quirky and comfortable we would definitely stay here again when we return
cleaned_advanced: perfect location near pier attraction staff efficient printed boarding pass problem quirky comfortable would definitely return

original_reviews: the room was very spacious and inviting the tub was big enough for 2 and the hotel even included some bath bombs to try out with the spa jets it was an enjoying bath we had a room that over looked alcatraz and golden gate bridge we even saw some seagulls that perched on the building across from us we were minutes from exploring the pier and the chocolate factory overall a great experience
reviews: love this hotel it is in the perfect location close to the cable car pickup and right on the water staff is very friendly and always willing to help shoutout to the doorman who always asks if we need something great job team argonaut
cleaned_advanced: love perfect location close cable car pickup right water staff friendly always willing help shoutout doorman always asks need something great job team argonaut

original_reviews: the argon hotel is a great location to be in the middle of all the attractions of sf it is a short walk from pier 39 union square and a short cab to professional sports games the lobby man prince was precise and pleasant in helping us with our luggage and questions would return again
reviews: june 2024 celebrating our 25th wedding anniversary with some very special friends also celebrating 25th anniversary we chose the argonaut for its location close to fishermans wharf the hotel was lovely spacious and clean if a little on the expensive side but we found out that we had picked a time that coincided with a major event locally escape from alcatraz triathlon so the prices were much higher than at other times note to selfcheck for local events next time our room was great very spacious and clean breakfast wasnt included but a limited menu was available in their in house restaurant but we found it expensive blue mermaid ill do a separate review for the meals here we went hunting and out the back of the hotel was an amazing place called 8am brunch 5 minute walk away would go back to sf just for that the wharf itself was very clean and very well looked after but we felt it had a seaside town feel about it with so many souvenir shops there
cleaned_advanced: june celebrating th wedding anniversary special friend also celebrating th anniversary chose argonaut location close fisherman wharf lovely spacious clean little expensive side found picked time coincided major event locally escape alcatraz triathlon price much higher time note selfcheck local event next time great spacious clean breakfast wasnt included limited menu available house restaurant found expensive blue mermaid ill separate review meal went hunting back amazing place called brunch minute walk away would go back sf wharf clean well looked felt seaside town feel many souvenir shop

original_reviews: i stayed at the argonaut with my family for two days and it was great the wharf was beautiful not too noisy and very touristy we were greeted by prince who took care of our luggage and explained how the hotel worked he was very nice spoke french for my parents to understand and had a very positive vibe he took us to our room and again was very sweet because of the service and the great rooms id love to come back to this hotel hopefully prince will still be there
reviews: great location spacious rooms and friendly staff definitely recommend staying at this hotel blue mermaid food was delicious their breakfasts are the best i enjoy my stay and i look forward to coming back
cleaned_advanced: great location spacious friendly staff definitely recommend staying blue mermaid food delicious breakfast best enjoy look forward coming back

original_reviews: we thought this location was amazing close the fishermans wharf ghirardelli buena vista so much in close walking proximity we paid for the water view and were assigned to a room on the 2nd floor which didnt provide much of a view so we asked to be reassigned they happily accommodated our request honestly if youre not on a higher floor the water view price is not worth it in our first room we were able to see about an inch of the water the second room was much better we were very happy with our stay and would likely stay again
reviews: from a canning factory to an upscale hotel this hotel provides all the amenities anyone could ask for from the doorman in uniform to the special pillows on the bed this hotel is an example of turning something old into something new the rooms are large beds are comfortable and the bathrooms are modern the staff is friendly and efficient
cleaned_advanced: canning factory upscale provides amenity anyone could ask doorman uniform special pillow bed example turning something old something new large bed comfortable bathroom modern staff friendly efficient

original_reviews: the room was beautiful the people working there were all friendly from bell boys to front desk to maids etc and helpful we had a view of the golden gate bridge from our bay view room we needed a few additional items in our room like extra wine glasses robes and coffee cups and they were delivered in no time best of all the rooms was so quiet im a light sleeper so thats important no street noise once the windows were closed and very little hall noise you could barely hear the shower or toilet flush when someone was in the bathroom
reviews: this is the place for the air show 4th of july or anything else you might want to do in the heart of the fishermans warf area we are from the bay area we come up to the argonaut once or twice a year and its always a perfect stay
cleaned_advanced: place air show th july anything else might want heart fisherman warf area bay area come argonaut twice year always perfect

original_reviews: this hotel was recommended and booked by our local tagreat choicethe location was excellent and the room facilities were all we needed and morestaff were so friendly and helpfulwhen they heard we were on a trip for our golden wedding they gave us a small gift from the hotel i could recommend this hotel to anyone planning to visit the area
reviews: this property had great views and outstanding service nice touch to give a 10 credit for the restaurant splurge and get room with view of golden gate its well worth it they made it easy to add on wine for our arrival and even had a souvenir for purchase in the room my son loved his argonaut sea otter
cleaned_advanced: property great view outstanding service nice touch give credit restaurant splurge get view golden gate well worth made easy add wine arrival even souvenir purchase son loved argonaut sea otter

original_reviews: very good location and a really nice comfortable room restaurant and bar were excellent we ate breakfast here twice and it was good with a good choice the ciopinno was excellent will definitely stay here again
reviews: nice and cool place to spend time in san francisco near fishermans wharf the staff is very helpful in any situation even if they towed my car be careful and take care for colored marks on the street even if they are washed and look like from 100 years ago the high towing costs for my car peter compensated with a good rebate in the restaurant we highly appreciated this complementary gesture thank you peter
cleaned_advanced: nice cool place spend time san francisco near fisherman wharf staff helpful situation even towed car careful take care colored mark street even washed look like year ago high towing cost car peter compensated good rebate restaurant highly appreciated complementary gesture thank peter

original_reviews: hotel is in great location right on the wharf we rented a car because we were also visiting family on the other side of the bay but id recommend against it as this is a very busy area with lots of pedestrians the location is in the heart of many attractions including ghirardelli lombard street boats to alcatraz and fishermens wharf i love the kimpton hotels for their quirkiness and this was no different appears to be original brickwork in rooms nice deep tub we rented a king suit and it was plenty big for two adults and child now for the negatives the room was oddly shaped and seemed to have a lot of wasted space it was more like one large l shaped room with the end of the l being nothing but the entry way and a small sitting table it was clean but looks like it is ready for a remodel shower door barely opened and closed needs new paint the restaurant food was not good and the restaurant looked like it needed to be cleaned my other issue was with the concierge we had not booked tickets to alcatraz but my daughter wanted to go i asked the concierge and was told to check back the next day and she may have tickets that morning she walked me down to a guy who i figured later was a ticket broker who sent me to another guy where i paid 90 per person for a bay cruise and alcatraz tickets separate tours but i had no choice the face value for each tour was 30 which i didnt realize until after i had paid so basically i had paid an 270 for tours 2 tours for 3 people i could have paid 180 for since the bay tours werent sold out and i could have gotten those at any time i was really paying double to go to alcatraz im not so bothered that i had to pay more than face value since it was my mistake in not booking in advance but did not like that the concierge did not explain to me ahead of time that she was taking me to a broker she simply told me to follow her as if she had some connection to get tickets had i known ahead of time i might have negotiated if negotiation was not an option the concierge should have explained to me the price ahead of time including that it was a markup and made the deal for me minor issue but it kind of bothered me in sum id recommend this hotel if you want to stay in this area but i wouldnt go out of my way to stay there
reviews: very average hotel nothing extraordinary about it would probably never stay again unless it was discounted 50 off not having any type of breakfast service at all except from the restaurant attached was frustrating
cleaned_advanced: average nothing extraordinary would probably never unless discounted type breakfast service except restaurant attached frustrating

original_reviews: great location close to pier 39 fishermans wharf and loads of restaurants what you would expect of a 4 star hotel clean and comfortable and staff friendly and helpful breakfast was good in the hotel restaurant there is a small museum part of the hotel which is worth a quick look and is free
reviews: san fransisco is best experienced at fishermans wharf right next to historic cable cars is the equally historic unique and beautiful argonaut hotel the front desk and concierge are world class with amazing insight to activities and restaurants in the bay area and beyond staff are incredibly sincere and helpful they upgraded my room free of charge gave us free gifts to celebrate our engagement and even assisted in coordinating parts of it i would not stay anywhere else
cleaned_advanced: san fransisco best experienced fisherman wharf right next historic cable car equally historic unique beautiful argonaut front desk concierge world class amazing insight activity restaurant bay area beyond staff incredibly sincere helpful upgraded free charge gave u free gift celebrate engagement even assisted coordinating part would anywhere else

original_reviews: we loved the amiance as soon as we walked in charming great location if you are looking to stay in this area we had a fantastic water view we were offered our choice of a bridge or alcatraz view easy walk to pier 39 ghiradelli square and the buena vista for irish coffee the street cars and the cable cars they gave a credit in the restaraunt and shops the rooms were cute bathrooms very small and the walls were thin but those things are to be expected in a more historic building our only problem was that we couldnt get a luggage rack in the room to put the suitcase on i have some physical limitations at the moment and that was problematic but otherwise we really enjoyed our stay here
reviews: just stayed for a long weekend getaway and loved this place the location is great the building is beautiful and the staff was excellent everyone there was friendly and helpful sad to see the current state of fishermans wharf with all the closures but still a wonderful place to visit
cleaned_advanced: stayed long weekend getaway loved place location great building beautiful staff excellent everyone friendly helpful sad see current state fisherman wharf closure still wonderful place visit

original_reviews: heres to another great stay at the argonaut hotel we stayed here for 4 nights in a king suite which fit 5 adults comfortably both the bedroom with a king bed and the livingdining room area are spacious and clean there is a sofa bed in the living room and we requested two rollaway beds for our sons and nephew to sleep on the suite is exactly as described on the website the bathroom was large and had enough counter space to fit all our toiletries the staff from the bell desk valet front desk concierge and housekeeping were so friendly and helpful the hotel is conveniently located next to the cable car turnaround and aquatic park it is within walking distance to ghirardelli square and of course the many shops and eateries on fishermans wharf there is the blue mermaid restaurant in the hotel and we must say the service this time was consistently on point once again our stay was very pleasant and enjoyable will be back again
reviews: the hotel was perfect right next to the cable car and the wharf completely remodeled and clean staff was very friendly and efficient you can walk just about anywhere you need to go valet parking for your car and many restaurants and shops within walking distance we ate at fog harbor fish house and it was great for breakfast we went to caf 8am for breakfast and that was fabulous
cleaned_advanced: perfect right next cable car wharf completely remodeled clean staff friendly efficient walk anywhere need go valet parking car many restaurant shop within walking distance ate fog harbor fish house great breakfast went caf breakfast fabulous

original_reviews: good location for the bay and piers but some distance from main shopping areassites though these can be reached by adjacent cable car service of taxi uber staff helpful but a little distant comfortable well equipped room can be a little noisy around the hotel expensive food and services
reviews: i am a fan of the kimpton hotel group and have stayed at other kimptons in sf and across the us i wanted to give the argonaut a try since the rooms looked visually appealing and the reviews were on par with my experiences at other kimptons overall i would actually say that our stay was disappointing for several reasons most on the part of the argonaut the rest on myself disappointing aspects in no specific order the staff i felt it was rather nonexistent aside from the gentlemen working the front door checkin was fine but not overly welcoming this was unusual for a kimpton checkout well even though we stood in line we waited longer since a person just sauntered up to ask questions and the the guest relations representative allowed this to happen my usually experience at a kimpton is you are often greeted warmly throughout your stay and there is a large staff presence in the hotel any other kimpton i have stayed at i would constantly see and be greeted by staff members at all hours of the day this was not the case here the wine hour was packed and seemed to be filled with people who knew about it but were actually not staying at the hotel in fact i often saw people walking away from the hotel with wine glasses this seems like a real liability issue i am not even sure there are people managing the wine hour there was no complimentary or tea or coffee service as you would find at other kimptons in the morning sure there was a coffee maker in the room but in the bathroom and that was uncomfortable at best they probably didnt want to deal with another round of people coming in for the free items logical but not really a kimpton experience the rooms the rooms are visually appealing and spacious but the beds were so hard that we barely slept in hindsight we wish we would have check out and tried another hotel because all of us 3 stayed in one room found we were in pain a week after traveling this is something another guest noted the beds in the double rooms are way too hard i actually prefer a firmer bed but these beds were so hard that one of us actually decided to try sleeping in the arm chair in the room they were that uncomfortable i cant convey how much this impacted our stay and the days after our stay i really felt awful and i am very sorry that i didnt saying anything about it at the time because i paid financially physically and mentally for it cleanliness the room was mostly clean but there were a lot of inconsistencies in the cleaning from day one to day two and three i also found it frustrating that the carpets were not vacuumed daily this seems like basic room service to me i felt there was a disconnect in this area that could be easily managed we left tips daily which were taken but the items we specifically requested more towels floor vacuumed were not provided the restaurant is terrible dont go there are much better places to eat in sf and i highly recommend that you by bypass it at all cost our breakfast was terrible the service was careless and lackadaisical our server actually told us he spaced out while taking our order the food was served cold without any condiments and it was expensive for what you get skip it the location this is my fault i wanted to try something different and get out of downtown but i felt this location was too much on the fringe of everything sure it was within walking distance to many things but they were not things i am that interested in if you want to stay on the wharf note that this is on the fringe of it not the heart of it if you dont want to be in a touristy location with the ding ding ding of the trolley nearby and the hoots and shouts of the duck boats then stay away from this location at all costs it will make you mad while not a big deal the hotel is also fully of families at all hours children were running up and down the halls there are also only two elevators and you often had to wait a short wait not a big deal to get to your room at all hours after thinking about it after the fact i would stay this stay was rather poor if i had to do it all over again i would really consider bringing it up the the management but i checked in on christmas day and i heard them tell someone inquiring about a room that they only had two left i knew it would be fruitless to complain about the beds when there was clearly no comparable room we could be moved to when we left the doorman asked us how our stay was and we mentioned the how terrible the beds were and his response was everyone says that its been a real problem and management is looking into it this actually made everything worse really you know this is a problem but youre just looking into it the really frustrating aspect is that its very hard to find many rooms in the sf area with two queen beds most of the rooms offer only two full beds while this is find for two people its challenging for three adults this was the main reason we selected this hotel because it was important for all of us to be together in the same room during the holidays i wouldnt stay again and i would suggest others look elsewhere when in the area there are many great hotels in sf its perhaps one of the most competitive hotel markets in any city ive traveled to and in dont sell yourself short make sure you select a hotel that really fits what you are looking for in regards to location comfort cleanliness friendliness price and room parameters its possible that this hotel will meet your needs but dont be fooled by all of the positive praise it has received it was just okay
